An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. In order to exploit this vulnerability, either the attacker or the victim would need to have access to the RoboHelp Help Errors log.Refer to APSB09-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0524.title: Adobe RoboHelp generated files cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0524.body: Adobe RoboHelp is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of files generated by RoboHelp. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified attack vectors to inject malicious script into help files, which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the file is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to APSB09-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0526.title: AdaptCMS Lite index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0526.body: AdaptCMS Lite is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the url or acuparam parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0527.title: AdaptCMS Lite sitepath parameter file include
CVE-2009-0527.body: AdaptCMS Lite could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the rss_importer_functions.php script using the sitepath parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0531.title: A Better Member-Based ASP Photo Gallery view.asp SQL injection
CVE-2009-0531.body: A Better Member-Based ASP Photo Gallery is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the view.asp script using the entry parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of A Better Member-Based ASP Photo Gallery (1.2 or later), available from the Active Server Scripts Web page. See References.

CVE-2009-0536.title: IBM AIX at command information disclosure
CVE-2009-0536.body: IBM AIX could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the "at" command being installed setuid root and failing to drop privileges when reading specific files. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read arbitrary files and obtain sensitive information.Refer to IBM SECURITY ADVISORY, Tue Feb 10 12:08:53 CST 2009 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0540.title: Libero search term cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0540.body: Libero is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using HTML tags to inject malicious script into the search term form field which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the field is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Libero (5.5 or later), available from the Libero Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0541.title: Magento downloader cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0541.body: Magento is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the [installation path]/downloader/index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0541.title: Magento forgotpasswordAction() cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0541.body: Magento is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the forgotpasswordAction() member function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the email parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0541.title: Magento login() cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0541.body: Magento is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login() member function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the login[username] parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0544.title: PyCrypto ARC2 buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0544.body: PyCrypto is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ARC2 module. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Python Cryptography Toolkit GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2009-0569.title: Becky! Internet Mail read receipt buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0569.body: Becky! Internet Mail is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling read receipt requests. By persuading the victim to return a receipt message containing malformed code, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Becky! Internet Mail (2.50 or later), available from the RimArts Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0572.title: FlatnuX CMS _FNROOTPATH parameter file include
CVE-2009-0572.body: FlatnuX CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files when register_globals is enabled and magic_quotes_gpc disabled. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the flatnux.php script using the _FNROOTPATH parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of FlatnuX CMS (2009-02-06 or later), available from the FlatnuX Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0575.title: Views Bulk Operations module for Drupal theme_views_bulk_operations_confirmation() cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0575.body: The Views Bulk Operations module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the theme_views_bulk_operations_confirmation() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2009-005 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0577.title: CUPS texttops WriteProlog() buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0577.body: CUPS is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error in the WriteProlog() function within the texttops utility. By sending a specially-crafted PostScript file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Refer to RHSA-2009-0308 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0578.title: NetworkManager D-Bus modify and delete request security bypass
CVE-2009-0578.body: NetworkManager could allow local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper enforcement of permissions when responding to D-Bus modify and delete requests. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using D-Bus to modify or delete network connections.For Ubuntu: Refer to USN-721-1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0580.title: Apache Tomcat j_security_check information disclosure
CVE-2009-0580.body: Apache Tomcat could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the authentication form. A different password prompt is returned when a login attempt is made via an invalid username. If j_security_check is used in conjunction with MemoryRealm, DataSourceRealm, or JDBCRealm, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability, using brute force techniques, to enumerate valid usernames and gain unauthorized access to the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the SVN repository. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0581.title: LittleCMS unspecified denial of service
CVE-2009-0581.body: LittleCMS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified memory leak error. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image file, a remote attacker could cause the affected application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0582.title: Evolution NTLM SASL information disclosure
CVE-2009-0582.body: Evolution could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper validation of NTLM packets by the NTLM SASL authentication mechanism in Camel. By persuading a victim to connect to a malicious email server, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted NTLM authentication type 2 packets to the ntlm_challenge() function to obtain restricted memory content and other sensitive information.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0583.title: Ghostscript icclib native color buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0583.body: Ghostscript is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the International Color Consortium Format Library (icclib). By persuading a victim to translate a specially-crafted image file containing ICC data into another native color using a device file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash. Note: This vulnerability also affects other applications that use the icclib code.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0584.title: Ghostscript icclib buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0584.body: Ghostscript is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by the International Color Consortium Format Library (icclib). By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image file containing ICC data, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash. Note: This vulnerability also affects other applications that use the icclib code.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0585.title: libsoup soup-misc.c buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0585.body: libsoup is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the soup_base64_encode function in soup-misc.c. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via an overly long string that is converted from a base64 representation to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of libsoup (2.24.0 or later), available from the GNOME Live! Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0590.body: OpenSSL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an invalid memory access error in the ASN1_STRING_print_ex() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a BMPString or UniversalString containing an illegal encoded length to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenSSL (0.9.8k or later), available from the OpenSSL Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0591.title: OpenSSL CMS_verify() function security bypass
CVE-2009-0591.body: OpenSSL could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the CMS_verify() function when handling error conditions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using malformed signed attributes containing invalid signed attributes to bypass content digest checks.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenSSL (0.9.8k or later), available from the OpenSSL Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0602.title: WikkiTikkiTavi upload.php file upload
CVE-2009-0602.body: WikkiTikkiTavi could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the upload.php script. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0603.title: Link module for Drupal description cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0603.body: The Link module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote authenticated attacker with "administer content types" permission could exploit this vulnerability using the description parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0606.title: Open Handset Alliance Android dynamic linker privilege escalation
CVE-2009-0606.body: Open Handset Alliance Android could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper handling of file descriptors by the link_image function in the dynamic linker in Bionic within Open Handset Alliance Android. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to create arbitrary files with gid permissions.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0607.title: Open Handset Alliance Android malloc_leak.c integer overflow
CVE-2009-0607.body: Open Handset Alliance Android is vulnerable to multiple integer overflows in malloc_leak.c within Bionic. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors related to the chk_calloc and leak_calloc functions to possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0608.title: Open Handset Alliance Android showlog buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0608.body: Open Handset Alliance Android is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the showLog function within liblog. By sending an overly large number of input lines, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0611.title: Novell QuickFinder Server multiple parameters cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0611.body: Novell QuickFinder Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by AdminServlet. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the siteloc, site, adminurl or print-list parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0612.title: Trend Micro InterScan Proxy-Authorization information disclosure
CVE-2009-0612.body: Trend Micro InterScan Web Security Suite and Trend Micro InterScan Web Security Virtual Appliance could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper handling of the Proxy-Authorization header when basic authorization is enabled. By persuading a victim to connect to a third-party website using Windows Media Player, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the proxy username and password and other sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0614.title: Cisco Unified MeetingPlace Web Conferencing unauthorized access
CVE-2009-0614.body: Cisco Unified MeetingPlace Web Conferencing could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system, caused by an unspecified authentication bypass vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to gain unauthorized access to the MeetingPlace application and possibly gain complete control of the system.Refer to cisco-sa-20090225-mtgplace for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0628.title: Cisco IOS WebVPN and SSLVPN TCB memory leak denial of service
CVE-2009-0628.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a transmission control blocks (TCBs) memory leak error when the WebVPN or SSLVPN feature is enabled. By abnormally disconnecting multiple SSL sessions, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of all memory resources.Refer to cisco-sa-20090325-webvpn for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0635.title: Cisco IOS cTCP memory leak denial of service
CVE-2009-0635.body: Cisco IOS, when configured as an Easy VPN server, is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory leak in the Cisco Tunneling Control Protocol (cTCP) encapsulation feature. By sending specially-crafted TCP packets, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available memory and cause the device to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20090325-ctcp for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0641.title: FreeBSD telnet LD_PRELOAD code execution
CVE-2009-0641.body: FreeBSD could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the telnet daemon. Certain environment variables are not properly validated prior to executing /bin/login. By uploading a specially-crafted precompiled library, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the LD_PRELOAD environment variable and the value of a precompiled library to execute arbitrary code on the system with superuser privileges.Refer to FreeBSD-SA-09:05.telnetd for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2009-0642.title: Ruby OCSP_basic_verify() spoofing
CVE-2009-0642.body: Ruby could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the improper return of information by the OCSP_basic_verify() function when validating X.509 certificates. An attacker could accept a revoked x.509 certificate as valid and exploit this vulnerability to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information that could be used to launch further attacks against the victim's system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0643.title: Simple PHP News news.txt code execution
CVE-2009-0643.body: Simple PHP News could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation by the post.php script prior to being written to the news.txt file. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could inject code into the news.txt file using the post parameter and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0646.title: 4Site CMS FAQ module SQL injection
CVE-2009-0646.body: The FAQ module in 4Site CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the faq/index.shtml page using the "th" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0646.title: 4Site CMS News module SQL injection
CVE-2009-0646.body: The News module in 4Site CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the news/news1.shtml page using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0646.title: 4Site CMS Hotels module SQL injection
CVE-2009-0646.body: The Hotels module in 4Site CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the hotel page using the "h" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0647.title: Windows Live Messenger Charset denial of service
CVE-2009-0647.body: Windows Live Messenger is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a format string error when handling malformed messages. By sending a specially-crafted message containing modified "Charset" data, a remote attacker could cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0648.title: Falt4 CMS admin/index.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-0648.body: Falt4 CMS is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin/index.php. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request using an edit or edit_now action to change the administrator's password. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0651.title: Symantec Veritas NetBackup vnetd privilege escalation
CVE-2009-0651.body: Symantec Veritas NetBackup Enterprise Server and Symantec Veritas NetBackup Server could allow an attacker to gain privileges on the system, caused by the improper validation of input by the Veritas network daemon (vnetd) during the admin login process. By injecting malicious data during the process, a remote authenticated attacker from within the local network could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with administrative privileges.Refer to SYM08-002 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0655.title: Lenovo Veriface III plain image unauthorized access
CVE-2009-0655.body: Lenovo Veriface III could allow a local attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system. By introducing a "plain image" of an authorized user, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the system and login to the Windows account.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0658.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader JBIG2 image stream buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0658.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing a malformed JBIG2 image stream embedded within a PDF document. By persuading a victim to open a malicious PDF file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB09-03 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0659.title: TPTEST GetStatsFromLine() buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0659.body: TPTEST is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the GetStatsFromLine() function. By sending a specially-crafted STATS line containing an overly long email field, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0659.title: TPTEST pwd buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0659.body: TPTEST is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the GetStatsFromLine() function. By sending a specially-crafted STATS line containing a pwd tag field, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2013.

CVE-2009-0660.title: Mahara user profile cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0660.body: Mahara is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user profile data or blog functionality to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Mahara (1.1.2 or later), available from the Mahara Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0661.title: WeeChat IRC message denial of service
CVE-2009-0661.body: WeeChat is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing IRC messages. By sending a specially-crafted IRC message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of WeeChat (0.2.6.1 or later), available from the WeeChat Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0662.title: Plone unspecified session hijacking
CVE-2009-0662.body: Plone could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by an unspecified error when handling the login form. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted link and log into the application, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack another user's account.Upgrade to the latest version of Plone (3.2.2 or 3.9 or later), available from the Plone Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0663.title: libdbd-pg-perl unspecified buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0663.body: libdbd-pg-perl is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By sending unspecified input to an application that uses the getline and pg_getline functions to read database rows, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0668.title: Zope Object Database (ZODB) ZEO network protocol code execution
CVE-2009-0668.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Zope Object Database (ZODB) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when Zope Enterprise Objects (ZEO) database sharing is enabled. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using vectors related to the ZEO network protocol to execute arbitrary Python code with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Zope (3.8.2 or later), available from the Python Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0672.title: RavenNuke modules.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-0672.body: RavenNuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the user_prefix parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of RavenNuke (2.30.1 or later), available from the Raven Web Services Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0674.title: RavenNuke captcha.php afonts array parameter information disclosure
CVE-2009-0674.body: RavenNuke could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the captcha.php script when register_globals and display_errors are enabled. By sending requests with full pathnames in the aFonts array parameter, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to determine the existence of local files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of RavenNuke (2.30.1 or later), available from the Raven Web Services Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0674.title: RavenNuke captcha.php information disclosure
CVE-2009-0674.body: RavenNuke could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the captcha.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the aFonts parameter to obtain full path information via error messages.Upgrade to the latest version of RavenNuke (2.30.1 or later), available from the Raven Web Services Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0676.title: Linux Kernel sock.c sock_getsockopt() information disclosure
CVE-2009-0676.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper initialization of the sock_getsockopt() function in sock.c when the SO_BSDCOMPAT option is set. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view portions of kernel memory, which could be used to launch further attacks on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux Kernel (2.6.28.6 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0678.title: RavenNuke captcha.php information disclosure
CVE-2009-0678.body: RavenNuke could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the captcha.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the aFonts parameter to obtain full path information via error messages.Upgrade to the latest version of RavenNuke (2.30.1 or later), available from the Raven Web Services Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0679.title: RavenNuke Your Account module unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0679.body: RavenNuke is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input related to the Your Account module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of RavenNuke (RNv2.30.01 or later), available from the Ravens PHP Scripts And Web Hosting Forum. See References.

CVE-2009-0680.title: Netgear SSL312 VPN router denial of service
CVE-2009-0680.body: The Netgear SSL312 VPN router is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Web interface CGI binary when processing requests. A remote attacker with access to the Web interface of the VPN router could send a specially-crafted URL request to cgi-bin/welcome/VPN_only using a malformed parameter to cause the device to reboot.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0686.title: Trend Micro Internet Security Pro tmactmon.sys privilege escalation
CVE-2009-0686.body: Trend Micro Internet Security Pro could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper processing of user space parameters by the IOCTL handler of the tmactmon.sys driver. By sending a specially-crafted IRP in a METHOD_NEITHER IOCTL request to \\Device\\tmactmon, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0687.title: OpenBSD packet filter denial of service
CVE-2009-0687.body: OpenBSD is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL-pointer dereference in the packer filter (pf) implementation when translating packets. If a translation rule defining a protocol related to an invalid IP version is configured, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted IP packet to cause a kernel panic.For OpenBSD version 4.3: Apply the patch for this vulnerability (4.3/common/013_pf.patch), as listed in the OpenBSD 4.3 errata. See References. For OpenBSD version 4.4: Apply the patch for this vulnerability (4.4/common/013_pf.patch), as listed in the OpenBSD 4.4 errata. See References.

CVE-2009-0688.title: Sun Solaris Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) library sasl_encode64() function buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0688.body: The Sun Solaris Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) library is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the sasl_encode64() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the affected application to crash.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 259148 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0698.title: xine-lib 4xm demuxer code execution
CVE-2009-0698.body: xine-lib could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in the 4xm demuxer. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted 4X movie file with a large current_track value, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Update to the current version of xine-lib (1.1.16.2 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2009-0699.title: BusinessManager QUB and Bez74 parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0699.body: BusinessManager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the auftrag_allgemeinauftrag.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the QUB or Bez74 parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of BusinessManager (4.2 or later), available from the Plunet Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0700.title: BusinessManager Sys_DirAnzeige.jsp and auftrag_job.jsp scripts security bypass
CVE-2009-0700.body: BusinessManager could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of user supplied input by Sys_DirAnzeige.jsp and auftrag_job.jsp. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Pfad parameter or a direct request to bypass ACL security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to customer, order, and job information.Upgrade to the latest version of BusinessManager (4.2 or later), available from the Plunet Web site. CVE-2009-0701.body: Cybershade CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files when register_globals is enabled. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the THEME_header or THEME_footer parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0705.title: PowerNews news.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-0705.body: PowerNews is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the news.php script using the newsid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0706.title: Simple Review component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-0706.body: The Simple Review component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. Extensions Directory Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0707.body: PowerClan is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2009-0709.body: PHPFootball is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the user parameter, which could allow the attacker to bypass the authentication mechanism and view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0710.title: PHPFootball filter.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0710.body: PHPFootball is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the filter.php and login.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the dbfield or user parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0723.title: LittleCMS unspecified buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0723.body: LittleCMS is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by multiple integer overflows. See References.

CVE-2009-0726.body: The gigCalendar component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id or gigcal_gigs_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0729.title: Page Engine CMS fPrefix file include
CVE-2009-0729.body: Page Engine CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the recent_poll_include.php, login_include.php, statistics_include.php or the configuration.inc.php script using the fPrefix parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0732.title: Downloadcenter common.h file information disclosure
CVE-2009-0732.body: Downloadcenter could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper restrictions placed on the common.h file. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could download the database credentials and obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0733.title: LittleCMS ReadSetOfCurves() function buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0733.body: LittleCMS is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ReadSetOfCurves() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0743.title: Cisco Unified MeetingPlace Web Conferencing E-mail Address cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0743.body: Cisco Unified MeetingPlace Web Conferencing is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when viewing the details of a meeting. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the E-mail Address field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to cisco-sr-20090226-mtgplace for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2009-0749.body: OptiPNG could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error in the GIFReadNextExtension() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted GIF image, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (optipng-0.5.5.2.diff, optipng-0.6.1.2.diff or optipng-0.6.2.1.diff), available from the OptiPNG Web page. CVE-2009-0750.title: smNews login.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-0750.body: smNews is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0765.title: Kipper index.php file include
CVE-2009-0765.body: Kipper could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the configfile parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0777.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks. Invisible control characters are decoded on the location bar. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the %0B, %0C, %1C, %1D, %1E and %1F invisible control characters to spoof URLs on the location bar.Refer to MFSA 2009-11 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0781.title: Apache Tomcat cal2.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0781.body: Apache Tomcat is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the jsp/cal/cal2.jsp script in the calendar application within the examples Web application. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the time parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Tomcat (6.0.19, 5.5.28 or 4.1.40 or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Web site. CVE-2009-0787.title: Linux Kernel eCryptfs headers information disclosure
CVE-2009-0787.body: Linux Kernel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when storing eCryptfs headers. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain kernel memory and other sensitive information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. CVE-2009-0788.title: Red Hat Network Satellite Server URL security bypass
CVE-2009-0788.body: Red Hat Network Satellite Server could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when rewriting specific URLs. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to restricted information about the host system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. CVE-2009-0789.title: OpenSSL ASN1 structure denial of service
CVE-2009-0789.body: OpenSSL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an invalid memory access error when handling ASN1 structures. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted untrusted certificate to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenSSL (0.9.8k or later), available from the OpenSSL Web site. CVE-2009-0790.title: Openswan and strongSwan DPD denial of service
CVE-2009-0790.body: Openswan and strongSwan are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference when processing Dead Peer Detection (DPD) packets. By sending a specially-crafted R_U_THERE or R_U_THERE_ACK Dead Peer Detection packet, a remote attacker could cause the application to crash and force the pluto IKE daemon to restart.For Openswan: Upgrade to the latest version of Openswan (2.4.14 or 2.6.21 or later), available from the Openswan Web site. See References. For strongSwan: Upgrade to the latest version of strongSwan (2.8.9 or 4.2.14 or later), available from the strongSwan Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0791.title: CUPS pdftops filter buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0791.body: CUPS is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by multiple integer overflows in the pdftops filter. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file, an attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to RHSA-2009-1083 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2009-0792.title: Ghostscript icc.c buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0792.body: Ghostscript is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by multiple integer overflows in icc.c within the International Color Consortium Format Library (icclib). By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted device file for a translation request that operates on a crafted image file and targets a certain "native color space," related to an ICC profile in a PostScript or PDF file with embedded images, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash. Note: This vulnerability also affects Argyll Color Management System (CMS).Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0798.title: acpid socket denial of service
CVE-2009-0798.body: acpid is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper closing of UNIX sockets. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available UNIX sockets and cause the daemon to enter into an infinite loop and hang.Upgrade to the latest version of acpid (1.0.10 or later), available from SourceForge.net. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0807.body: zFeeder could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper access restrictions on the admin.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a direct request to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the administrative panel.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0808.title: SimpleCMMS unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2009-0808.body: SimpleCMMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2009-0810.title: xGuestBook login.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-0810.body: xGuestBook is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0814.title: Blogsa widgets.aspx cross-site scripting

CVE-2009-0817.title: Protected node module for Drupal Password page cross-site scripting

CVE-2009-0824.body: Multiple SlySoft products are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper validation of buffer data by the IOCTL handler in the ElbyCDIO.sys Kernel driver. CVE-2009-0827.body: PollHelper could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the poll.inc include file. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a direct request to obtain MySQL database user credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0837.title: Foxit Reader PDF Open\Execute buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0837.body: Foxit Reader is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. If an Open/Execute file action is processed within PDF files containing an overly long filename, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Foxit Reader (3.0 Build 1506 or 2.3 Build 3902 or later), available from the Foxit Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0838.title: Sun Solaris crypto pseudo device driver unspecified denial of service
CVE-2009-0838.body: An unspecified error related to the vmem_hash_delete() function in the Sun Solaris crypto pseudo device driver could allow a local attacker to cause a kernel panic using unknown attack vectors.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 254088 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0841.title: MapServer mapserv CGI directory traversal
CVE-2009-0841.body: MapServer could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the mapserv CGI containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the id parameter to write or view arbitrary files on the system.Refer to the mapserver-users Mailing list posting dated Thu Mar 26 22:40:02 EDT 2009 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0845.title: MIT Kerberos 5 (krb5) spnego_gss_accept_sec_context() function denial of service
CVE-2009-0845.body: MIT Kerberos 5 (krb5) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error in the spnego_gss_accept_sec_context() function. By sending a specially-crafted NegTokenInit token, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the daemon to crash.For Apple Mac OS: Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References. Apply the patch for this vulnerability (spnego_mech.c), available from the MIT Kerberos 5 (krb5) SVN Repository. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0848.title: OpenSUSE GTK2 privilege escalation
CVE-2009-0848.body: OpenSUSE could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an untrusted search path error in GTK2. By persuading a victim to load a Trojan horse GTK module in an unspecified "relative search path", a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0849.title: NovaNET DtbClsLogin() buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0849.body: NovaNET is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the DtbClsLogin() function in libnnlindtb.so on a Linux operating system. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system. Note: Reportedly, successful exploitation in nnwindtb.dll on a Windows operating system could cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0857.title: Sun Management Center (SunMC) Performance Reporting Module cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0857.body: Sun Management Center (SunMC) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Performance Reporting Module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the msg parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 247046 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0858.title: djbdns response packet spoofing
CVE-2009-0858.body: djbdns could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the improper handling of malformed response packets by the response_addname function. By sending an overly long response packet, a remote attacker with control over a third-party subdomain, could exploit this vulnerability to perform DNS Cache Poisoning and redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0859.title: Linux Kernel shm_get_stat denial of service
CVE-2009-0859.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the shm_get_stat function within the shm subsystem. If CONFIG_SHMEM is disabled, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an SHM_INFO call to misinterpret the data type of an inode and cause the system to hang.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux Kernel (2.6.28.5 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0861.title: phpDenora IRC channel names cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0861.body: phpDenora is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input of IRC channel names. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script and HTML into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of phpDenora (1.2.3 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2009-0863.title: S-CMS delete_page.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-0863.body: S-CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the delete_page.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0865.title: GeoVision LiveX ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2009-0865.body: The GeoVision LiveX ActiveX control (LIVEX_~1.OCX) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the PlayX() and SnapShotX() insecure methods to create and overwrite arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0867.title: Fujitsu Enhanced Support Facility HRM-S information disclosure
CVE-2009-0867.body: Fujitsu Enhanced Support Facility could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper handling of HRM-S client connections. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could obtain hardware and software configuration details and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Refer to Fujitsu Security Alert ESF-200901e for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0868.body: Fujitsu Jasmine2000 is vulnerable to HTTP response splitting attacks, caused by improper validation of input passed to the WebLink template. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters in a specially-crafted URL to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and cause the server to return a split response, once the URL is clicked. This would allow the attacker to perform further attacks, such as Web cache poisoning, cross-site scripting, and other malicious activity.Refer to Fujitsu Security Alert Jasmine-200901e for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0870.title: Sun Solaris NFSv4 hsfs denial of service
CVE-2009-0870.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the NFSv4 server kernel module. If the server is sharing an hsfs(7FS) file system, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to hang.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 252469 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0872.title: Sun Solaris NFS Server Security Modes unauthorized access
CVE-2009-0872.body: An unspecified error in Sun Solaris NFS Server Security Modes (nfssec(5)) could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system. If the resources are shared using "none" (AUTH_NONE) and "sys" (AUTH_SYS) security modes, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the shared resources.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 253588 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0873.title: Sun Solaris NFS server unauthorized access
CVE-2009-0873.body: Solaris NFS server (nfsd(1M)) could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system, when NFSv3 remote clients are granted multiple security modes. An attacker on one of these clients could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to shared files.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 250306 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0878.title: Wesnoth read_game_map() function denial of service
CVE-2009-0878.body: Wesnoth is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the read_game_map() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted map containing an overly large height or width value to cause the consumption of memory resources and cause the daemon to hang.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (r32987 or later), available from the Wesnoth SVN Repository. See References.

CVE-2009-0879.title: IBM Director CIM server consumer name denial of service
CVE-2009-0879.body: The IBM Director CIM server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper handling of malformed consumer names. By sending a specially-crafted M-POST request to the CIMListener, a remote attacker could cause the daemon to crash.Apply the fix for this vulnerability (5.20.3 Service Update 2), available to registered customers from the IBM Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0880.title: IBM Director CIM server directory traversal
CVE-2009-0880.body: The IBM Director CIM server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted M-POST request to the CIMListener containing "dot dot" sequences, which would allow the attacker to upload and execute arbitrary .dll files on the system.Apply the fix for this vulnerability (5.20.3 Service Update 2), available to registered customers from the IBM Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0881.title: isiAJAX paises.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-0881.body: isiAJAX is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the paises.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0883.title: Blue Eye CMS BlueEyeCMS_login cookie SQL injection
CVE-2009-0883.body: Blue Eye CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the BlueEyeCMS_login cookie, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0892.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server administrative console forced logout session hijacking
CVE-2009-0892.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to session hijacking. User sessions within the WebSphere administrative console might be subject to unauthorized access if a forced logout is performed by the current user. A forced logout is defined as providing the same credentials, as the WebSphere administrative logon page, for a user who is already logged into the administrative console and submitting that login request. A remote attacker with valid authentication credentials could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to an authenticated session. This vulnerability does not affect the wsadmin command.For WebSphere Application Server 6.1: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.1.0.23 or later) or APAR PK74966. See References. For WebSphere Application Server 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.1 or later) or APAR PK74966. See References.

CVE-2009-0895.title: Applicaton control request overflow
CVE-2009-0895.body: Novell eDirectory is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow. By sending a specially-crafted service request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Novell Document ID: 7004912 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0896.title: IBM WebSphere MQ client connection buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0896.body: The WebSphere MQ queue manager is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling certain client requests. By sending a specially-crafted request via the WebSphere MQ client, a remote attacker could trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash. Note: This vulnerability can not be exploited on queue managers secured with security exits or authentication through SSL, unless an attacker has valid authentication credentials or a valid SSL certificate. IBM acknowledges the assistance of MWR InfoSecurity Limited for the reporting and diagnosis of this problem.For WebSphere MQ 6.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.0.2.7 or later), APAR IZ50784, or APAR PK87106. See References. For WebSphere MQ 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.1.0 or later), APAR IZ50784, or APAR PK87106. See References.

CVE-2009-0899.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server IsSecurityEnabled VMM flag information disclosure
CVE-2009-0899.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. The Federated Repository (VMM) Security IsSecurityEnabled flag is incorrect when WebSphere Member Manager (WMM) is migrated to VMM. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.5 or later) or APAR PK78134. See References.

CVE-2009-0900.title: IBM WebSphere MQ client application Client Channel Definition Table (CCDT) buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0900.body: The IBM WebSphere MQ client application is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling CCDT files. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted Client Channel Definition Table (CCDT) file containing incorrect SSL information to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the client application to crash.For WebSphere MQ 6.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.0.2.7 or later) or APAR IC59375. See References. For WebSphere MQ 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.1.0 or later) or APAR IC59375. See References.

CVE-2009-0904.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server SOAP request security bypass
CVE-2009-0904.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when handling XML encoding. By sending a specially-crafted SOAP request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and possibly manipulate arbitrary data.For WebSphere Application Server 6.1: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.1.0.25 or later) or APAR PK84015. See References.

CVE-2009-0906.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Service Component Architecture (SCA) feature pack security bypass
CVE-2009-0906.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the Service Component Architecture (SCA) feature pack. An attacker that has not been assigned to the scaAllAuthorizedUsers role could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the authentication.transport intent and gain unauthorized access to the system.For WebSphere Application Server SCA 1.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (1.0.0.3 or later) or APAR PK86047. See References.

CVE-2009-0912.title: Mandriva perl-MDK-Common unspecified privilege escalation
CVE-2009-0912.body: Mandriva perl-MDK-Common could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper handling of strings when writing them to configuration files. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using special characters in multiple unspecified functions to gain elevated privileges on the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0917.title: PTK unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0917.body: DFLabs PTK is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a forensic image containing HTML documents to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of PTK (1.0.5 or later), available from the PTK Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0920.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager OvOSLocale buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0920.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Toolbar.exe CGI application. By sending an overly long OvOSLocale parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02416 SSRT090008 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0921.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager OvAcceptLang and Accept-Language buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0921.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to multiple heap-based buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by the Toolbar.exe CGI application. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request containing an overly long OvAcceptLang or Accept-Language parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02416 SSRT090008 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0924.title: Sun Solaris UFS filesystem x86 64-bit denial of service
CVE-2009-0924.body: Sun Solaris on x86 systems, when running in 64-bit mode, is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error related to the ufs_getpage() and ufs_putapage() functions when the root file system is UFS. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to hang.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 254628 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0925.title: Sun Solaris UFS filesystem SPARC sun4v denial of service
CVE-2009-0925.body: Sun Solaris on SPARC sub4v systems is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error related to the ufs_getpage() and ufs_putapage() functions when the root file system is UFS. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause all writes to a UFS file system to hang.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 254628 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0926.title: Sun Solaris UFS filesystem x86 32-bit denial of service
CVE-2009-0926.body: Sun Solaris on x86 systems, when running in 32-bit mode, is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error related to the ufs_getpage() and ufs_putapage() functions when a UFS file system is present. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to panic.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 254628 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-0933.title: Dotclear administration interface cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0933.body: Dotclear is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the administration interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Dotclear (2.1.5 or later), available from the Dotclear Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0934.title: ejabberd chatroom cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0934.body: ejabberd is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the multi user chatroom history to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of ejabberd (2.0.4 or later), available from the ProcessOne Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0942.title: Apple Mac OS X Help Viewer CSS code execution
CVE-2009-0942.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by Help Viewer. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted CSS file via the help: URL, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute AppleScript code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0943.title: Apple Mac OS X Help Viewer HTML code execution
CVE-2009-0943.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by Help Viewer. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted HTML file via the help: URL, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute AppleScript code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0945.title: Apple Safari WebKit SVGList buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0945.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the WebKit component when handling SVGList objects. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Safari (3.2.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0949.title: Apple CUPS IPP tag denial of service
CVE-2009-0949.body: Apple CUPS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error in ippReadIO(), in cups/ipp.c. By sending consecutive IPP tags, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the affected application to crash.For Mac OS X 10.5.7: Upgrade to the latest version of CUPS (1.3.10 or later), available from the CUPS Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-0951.title: Apple QuickTime FLC buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0951.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling FLC compression files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted FLC compression file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.6.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0953.title: Apple QuickTime PICT file buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0953.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling PICT images. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PICT file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.6.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0954.title: Apple QuickTime CRGN buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0954.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling movie files with Clipping Region (CRGN) atom types. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted movie file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.6.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0956.title: Apple QuickTime user data code execution
CVE-2009-0956.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an uninitialized memory access error when handling movie files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted movie file containing a zero user data atom size, a remote attacker could corrupt memory and cause the victim's QuickTime application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.6.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0957.title: Apple QuickTime JP2 buffer overflow
CVE-2009-0957.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling JP2 images. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted JP2 image, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.6.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0958.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone certificate information disclosure
CVE-2009-0958.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of an exception on a per-hostname basis once an untrusted Exchange certificate is accepted. By connecting to a malicious Exchange server, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain user credentials and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch (3.0 or later) or Apple iPhone (3.0 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0959.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone MPEG-4 denial of service
CVE-2009-0959.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of MPEG-4 video files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted MPEG-4 video file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reset.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch (3.0 or later) or Apple iPhone (3.0 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0963.title: PHPRunner SearchField SQL injection
CVE-2009-0963.body: PHPRunner is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the UserView_list.php, orders_list.php, users_list.php and Administrator_list.php scripts using the SearchField parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0965.title: GDL node parameter SQL injection
CVE-2009-0965.body: GDL is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the gdl.php script using the node parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0966.title: YABSoft Mega File Hosting Script cross.php file include
CVE-2009-0966.body: YABSoft Mega File Hosting Script could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the cross.php script using the url parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote or the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code using a local file, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-0969.title: phpFoX email account cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-0969.body: phpFoX is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by account/settings/account/. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to update the administrator's email address and perform other arbitrary tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, available for registered users from the phpFoX Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0970.title: PHP Pro Bid class_image.php file include
CVE-2009-0970.body: PHP Pro Bid could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the class_image.php script using the fileExtension parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP Pro Bid (6.05 or later), available from the PHP Pro Bid Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-0971.title: futomi's CGI Café Access Analyzer unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-0971.body: futomi's CGI Café Access Analyzer is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in an unspecified script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of CGI Café Access Analyzer (4.0.2 or later), available from futomi's CGI Cafe Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-1022.title: GOM Encoder .srt file buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1022.body: GOM Encoder is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Preview/ Set Segment function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .srt subtitle file containing an overly long text field, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1023.title: phpComasy entry_id SQL injection
