An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass filters which could be leveraged to possibly launch cross-site scripting attacks.Upgrade to the latest version of Profense (2.4.4 or 2.2.22 or later), available from the Armorlogic Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-1636.title: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent email code execution
CVE-2009-1636.body: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of email messages by the SMTP protocol. By sending a specially-crafted SMTP message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM level privileges.Refer to Novell Document ID: 7003273 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-1636.title: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent SMTP code execution
CVE-2009-1636.body: Novell GroupWise Internet Agent could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By sending a specially-crafted SMTP message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM level privileges.Refer to Novell Document ID: 7003272 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-1637.title: Simple Customer profile.php security bypass
CVE-2009-1637.body: Simple Customer could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the profile.php script. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify the admin password and email address to gain unauthorized access to the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Simple Customer (1.5 or later), available from the Simple Customer Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-1638.title: Job Career Package JobCareerAdmin cookie security bypass
CVE-2009-1638.body: Job Career Package could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the JobCareerAdmin cookie, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrator access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1640.title: Nucleus Kernel Recovery for Macintosh .AMHH buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1640.body: Nucleus Kernel Recovery for Macintosh is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing .AMHH files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .AMHH file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1641.title: Mini-stream Ripper .ram and .asx buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1641.body: Mini-stream Ripper is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing malicious .ram and .asx files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .ram and .asx file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1642.title: ASX to MP3 Converter .ram and .asx file buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1642.body: ASX to MP3 Converter is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing malicious .ram and .asx files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .ram or .asx file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1643.title: Sorinara Soritong MP3 Player .m3u buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1643.body: Sorinara Soritong MP3 Player is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing .m3u files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .m3u file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1644.title: Sorinara Streaming Audio Player .PLA buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1644.body: Sorinara Streaming Audio Player is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing .PLA files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .PLA file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1645.title: Easy RM to MP3 Converter .ram and .asx file buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1645.body: Mini-stream Easy RM to MP3 Converter is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing malicious .ram and .asx files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .ram or .asx file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1653.title: TinyButStrong script file include
CVE-2009-1653.body: TinyButStrong could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the tbs_us_examples_0view.php script using the script parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1657.title: Starrating plugin for b2evolution unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2009-1657.body: Starrating plugin for b2evolution is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of the Starrating plugin (0.7.7 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2009-1661.title: microTopic rating SQL injection
CVE-2009-1661.body: microTopic is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the utopic.php script using the rating parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of microTopic (1.01 or later), available from SourceForge.net. See References.

CVE-2009-1662.title: Recipe Script login.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-1662.body: Recipe Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the username or password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1665.title: Easy Scripts Answer and Question Script userid security bypass
CVE-2009-1665.body: Easy Scripts Answer and Question Script could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions placed on the myaccount.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the modified userid parameter to bypass security restrictions to delete arbitrary user accounts.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1669.title: Smarty smarty_function_math() function command execution
CVE-2009-1669.body: Smarty could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation by the function.math.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via the smarty_function_math() function to inject and execute shell commands on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-1670.title: TCPDB user/index.php security bypass
CVE-2009-1670.body: TCPDB could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the user/index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to bypass security restrictions to add arbitrary administrative accounts.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1672.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment ActiveX control code execution
CVE-2009-1672.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment ActiveX control (deploytk.dll) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes a .jnlp URL in the argument to the launch, installLatestJRE or installJRE method, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Sun Java Runtime Environment customers should contact Sun support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2009-1675.title: 32bit FTP PASV buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1675.body: 32bit FTP is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing overly long responses to a PASV command received from the FTP server. By persuading a victim to connect to a malicious FTP server, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1675.title: 32bit FTP Banner buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1675.body: 32bit FTP is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing overly long Banner responses received from the FTP server. By persuading a victim to connect to a malicious FTP server, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1677.title: Bitweaver saveFeed() function code execution
CVE-2009-1677.body: Bitweaver could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation by the feedcreator.class.php script. By placing PHP sequences into the account "display name" setting and invoking boards_rss.php, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via the HTTP Host header to inject and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1679.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone profile security bypass
CVE-2009-1679.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper handling of configuration profiles. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a weaker passcode policy to overwrite the Exchange ActiveSync passcode policy and gain unauthorized access to the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch (3.0 or later) or Apple iPhone (3.0 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-1712.title: Apple Safari Java applets code execution
CVE-2009-1712.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the failure to prevent loading of Java applets. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the APPLET or OBJECT element to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Safari (4.0 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-1714.title: Apple Safari Web Inspector cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-1714.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the WebKit component. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using vectors related to the improper escaping of HTML attributes to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to read local files or steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Safari (4.0 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-1717.title: Apple Mac OS X Terminal buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1717.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow when handling "CSI[4" xterm window resizing escape code. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site or connect to a remote system using Terminal, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer, corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-1719.title: Apple Java HotSpot CColourUIResource code execution
CVE-2009-1719.body: Apple Java HotSpot could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code, caused by an error in the Aqua Look and Feel for Java implementation. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a call to an undocumented apple.laf.CColourUIResource constructor containing a malicious value in the argument to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Java for Mac OS X (10.5 Update 4 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-1726.title: Apple Mac OS X ColorSync profile buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1726.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking in ColorSync. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image containing an embedded ColorSync profile, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application crash.Apply Security Update 2009-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-1728.title: Apple Mac OS X Image RAW buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1728.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by Image RAW. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Canon RAW image, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2009-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-1729.title: Sun Java System Communications Express search.html and UWCMain cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-1729.body: Sun Java System Communications Express is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.html and UWCMain scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 258068 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-1730.title: NetDecision TFTP Server directory traversal
CVE-2009-1730.body: NetDecision TFTP Server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted PUT or GET request to the TFTP root directory containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1731.title: mlffat index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-1731.body: mlffat is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the supervisor cookie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1733.title: IPplan unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-1733.body: IPplan is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to change passwords, or add and delete arbitrary users. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1735.title: VidShare listing_video.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-1735.body: VidShare is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the listing_video.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1736.title: gsticketsystem component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-1736.body: The gsticketsystem component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.As a workaround for this vulnerability, uninstall the affected component.

CVE-2009-1737.title: MyPic dir directory traversal
CVE-2009-1737.body: MyPic could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the bom.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the dir parameter to read arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1738.title: Feed Block module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-1738.body: The Feed Block module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker with permission to administer news feeds could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified vectors in aggregator items to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2009-028 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-1739.title: PAD Site Scripts cookie security bypass
CVE-2009-1739.body: PAD Site Scripts could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the authuser cookie parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1740.title: D-Link MPEG4 Viewer ActiveX Control (csviewer.ocx) buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1740.body: The D-Link MPEG4 Viewer ActiveX Control (csviewer.ocx) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string to the SetFilePath() or SetClientCookie() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1742.title: pc4 Uploader code.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-1742.body: pc4 Uploader is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the code.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1743.title: Pinnacle Studio .hfz file directory traversal
CVE-2009-1743.body: Pinnacle Studio could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .hfz file containing "dot dot" sequences (\\..\\), an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1744.title: Pinnacle Studio .hfz file denial of service
CVE-2009-1744.body: Pinnacle Studio is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in InstallHFZ.exe. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Hollywood FX Compressed Archive (.hfz) file, a remote attacker could cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1751.title: Realty Web-Base list_list.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-1751.body: Realty Web-Base is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the list_list.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1752.title: exJune Office Message System configure.asp and addmessage2.asp security bypass
CVE-2009-1752.body: exJune Office Message System could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the configure.asp and addmessage2.asp scripts. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could bypass security and gain unauthorized access to the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1756.title: SLiM X authority information disclosure
CVE-2009-1756.body: SLiM could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the generation of the X authority file when the X authority cookie is passed using the command line to xauth. By accessing the process list, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the X authority cookie and gain unauthorized access to the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1759.title: Enhanced CTorrent and DTorrent btFiles::BuildFromMI() buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1759.body: Enhanced CTorrent and DTorrent are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the btFiles::BuildFromMI() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted torrent file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-1760.title: Rasterbar Software libtorrent path element directory traverasl
CVE-2009-1760.body: Rasterbar Software libtorrent could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by improper validation of path elements extracted in Multiple File Mode. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .torrent file containing directory traversal sequences, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to traverse directories and create or overwrite arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Rasterbar Software libtorrent (0.14.4 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References. For Deluge: Upgrade to the latest version of Deluge (1.1.9 or later), available from the Deluge Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-1761.title: CA ARCserve Backup ASCORE module denial of service
CVE-2009-1761.body: CA ARCserve Backup is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the ASCORE module. By sending a specially-crafted RPC packet to TCP port 6503, a remote attacker could cause the message engine to crash.Refer to CA Security Advisory Vulnerability ID: 209502 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2009-1764.title: Dream Windows MaxCMS inc/ajax.asp SQL injection
CVE-2009-1764.body: Dream Windows MaxCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the inc/ajax.asp script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1767.title: Template Monster Clone edituser.php security bypass
CVE-2009-1767.body: Template Monster Clone could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the edituser.php script. By sending a direct request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the loginname, password, email, firstname or lastname parameter to change arbitrary user passwords.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1774.title: StrawBerry index.php file include
CVE-2009-1774.body: StrawBerry could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the file parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1783.title: Multiple F-PROT products CAB security bypass
CVE-2009-1783.body: Multiple F-PROT products could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability in the file parsing engine. By sending a specially-crafted CAB file to a vulnerable system, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass scanning detection and possibly launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1784.title: Multiple AVG products ZIP security bypass
CVE-2009-1784.body: Multiple AVG products could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability in the file parsing engine. CVE-2009-1788.title: libsndfile VOC buffer overflow
CVE-2009-1788.body: libsndfile is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the voc_read_header() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted VOC file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash. Note: This vulnerability also affects Winamp.Upgrade to the latest version of libsndfile (1.0.20 or later), available from the Libsndfile Web page. See References.

CVE-2009-1827.title: Mozilla Firefox loop denial of service

CVE-2009-1828.body: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of the Keygen HTML tags. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a KEYGEN element in conjunction with a META element specifying automatic page refresh or a JavaScript onLoad event handler for a BODY elementto cause the browser to stop responding and possibly obtain sensitive information from a memory leak.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-1840.title: Mozilla Firefox XUL security bypass
CVE-2009-1840.body: Mozilla Firefox could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to check content-loading policies prior to loading external script files into XUL documents. CVE-2009-1856.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader is vulnerable to heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow when parsing a FlateDecode filter embedded within a PDF file . CVE-2009-1858.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in the JBIG2 filter. CVE-2009-1879.title: Adobe Flex index.template.html cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-1879.body: Adobe Flex is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.template.html express-install template file. CVE-2009-1884.title: Compress::Raw::Bzip2 module for Perl bzinflate() denial of service
CVE-2009-1884.body: The Compress::Raw::Bzip2 module for Perl is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an off-by-one error in the bzinflate() function. CVE-2009-1885.title: Xerces C++ DTD structure denial of service
CVE-2009-1885.body: Xerces C++ is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a recursion error when parsing simply nested DTD structures. CVE-2009-1889.title: Pidgin Open System for CommunicAtion in Realtime (OSCAR) denial of service
CVE-2009-1889.body: Pidgin is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an out-of-memory flaw in the Open System for CommunicAtion in Realtime (OSCAR) protocol implementation. CVE-2009-1897.title: Linux Kernel tun_chr_poll() code execution
CVE-2009-1897.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the tun_chr_poll() function. CVE-2009-1898.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server secure login information disclosure
CVE-2009-1898.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to redirect to an https page after receiving an http request by the secure login page in the Administrative Console component. CVE-2009-1900.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Administrative Configservice API information disclosure variant 1
CVE-2009-1900.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the Administrative Configservice API when tracing has been enabled. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the wsadmin scripting tool to obtain sensitive information from affected Java applications.For WebSphere Application Server 6.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.0.2.35 or later) or APAR PK84999. See References. For WebSphere Application Server 6.1: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.1.0.25 or later) or APAR PK84999. See References. For WebSphere Application Server 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.5 or later) or APAR PK84999. See References.
