CVE-2009-2026.title: Multiple CA products dtscore library buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2026.body: Multiple CA products are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Data Transport Services dtscore library. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to CA20090806-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2027.title: Apple Safari Installer privilege escalation
CVE-2009-2027.body: Apple Safari could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the Windows Installer. If the checkbox for the installer is checked, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the compression method to immediately launch the application after installation.Upgrade to the latest version of Safari (4.0 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2037.title: Online Grades & Attendance admin.php file include
CVE-2009-2037.body: Online Grades & Attendance could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker with administrative access could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.php script using the skin parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2037.title: Online Grades & Attendance GLOBALS[SKIN] file include
CVE-2009-2037.body: Online Grades & Attendance could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request using the GLOBALS[SKIN] parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2040.title: Grestul options.php security bypass
CVE-2009-2040.body: Grestul could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions placed on the options.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to add administrative accounts to the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2041.body: A51 D.O.O. activeCollab is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by an unspecified script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of activeCollab (2.1 or later), available from the activeCollab Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2042.title: libpng 1-bit (2-color) interlaced image information disclosure
CVE-2009-2042.body: libpng could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an uninitialized-memory-read error when handling 1-bit (2-color) interlaced images. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted image containing widths that are not divisible by 8, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to display or process out-of-bounds pixels.Upgrade to the latest version of libpng (1.2.37 or later), available from the libpng Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2043.title: Mozilla Firefox nsViewManager.cpp denial of service
CVE-2009-2043.body: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the nsViewManager.cpp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerabilty using attck vectors related to interaction with TinyMCE to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Firefox (3.0.11 or later), available from the Mozilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2044.title: Mozilla Firefox GIF denial of service
CVE-2009-2044.body: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to a denial of service attack, caused by the improper handling of GIF files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted GIF image in the BACKGROUND attribute of a BODY element, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the vulnerable browser.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2047.title: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express (Cisco Unified CCX) server administration interface directory traversal
CVE-2009-2047.body: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express (Cisco Unified CCX) server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the Customer Response Solutions (CRS) Administration interface containing directory traversal sequences to view, modify, or delete arbitrary files on the system.Refer to cisco-sa-20090715-uccx for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2048.title: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express (Cisco Unified CCX) server administrative interface cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2048.body: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express (Cisco Unified CCX) server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Customer Response Solutions (CRS) Administration interface. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious JavaScript into the Cisco Unified CCX database which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to cisco-sa-20090715-uccx for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2060.title: Google Chrome CONNECT code execution
CVE-2009-2060.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the src/net/http/http_transaction_winhttp.cc. The context of the document in a 4xx or 5xx CONNECT response request is determined by a HTTP Host header. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques via a proxy server to intercept and modify a CONNECT request and reply with a response containing malicious code which would be executed within the context of the victim's requested SSL-protected domain.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2062.title: Apple Safari HTTP CONNECT code execution
CVE-2009-2062.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the processing of a 3xx HTTP CONNECT prior to a successful SSL handshake. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to intercept and modify a CONNECT response containing malicious code which would be executed within the context of the victim's system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2063.title: Opera HTTP CONNECT code execution
CVE-2009-2063.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the processing of a 3xx HTTP CONNECT prior to a successful SSL handshake. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to intercept and modify a CONNECT response containing malicious code which would be executed within the context of the victim's system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2064.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer https security bypass
CVE-2009-2064.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the detection of http content in https Web pages only during the use of https by the top-level frame. By modifying an http page to include an https iframe that references a script file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using network sniffing tools to bypass security restrictions and obtain sensitive data and launch further attacks on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2065.title: Mozilla Firefox https security bypass
CVE-2009-2065.body: Mozilla Firefox could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the detection of http content in https Web pages only during the use of https by the top-level frame. By modifying an http page to include an https iframe that references a script file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using network sniffing tools to bypass security restrictions and obtain sensitive data and launch further attacks on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2066.title: Apple Safari https security bypass
CVE-2009-2066.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the detection of http content in https Web pages only during the use of https by the top-level frame. By modifying an http page to include an https iframe that references a script file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using network sniffing tools to bypass security restrictions and obtain sensitive data and launch further attacks on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2068.title: Google Chrome https security bypass
CVE-2009-2068.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the detection of http content in https Web pages only during the use of https by the top-level frame. By modifying an http page to include an https iframe that references a script file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using network sniffing tools to bypass security restrictions and obtain sensitive data and launch further attacks on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2073.title: Linksys WRT160N unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-2073.body: Linksys WRT160N is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Web interface. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2080.title: Mr CGI Guy The Ticket System admin.php security bypass
CVE-2009-2080.body: Mr CGI Guy The Ticket System could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id parameter to change the password for the administrator.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2108.title: git-daemon xinetd denial of service
CVE-2009-2108.body: git-daemon is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing additional request parameters. By sending specially-crafted requests, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability using xinetd to cause the application to consume all available CPU resources and enter into an infinite loop.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2009-2110.title: DB Top Sites index.php file include
CVE-2009-2110.body: DB Top Sites could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the full.php, contact.php and index.php scripts using the "u" parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2111.title: DB Top Sites add_reg.php code execution
CVE-2009-2111.body: DB Top Sites could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of input by the add_reg.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the location parameter to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2114.title: SkyBlueCanvas admin.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2114.body: SkyBlueCanvas is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the mgroup or mgr parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of SkyBlueCanvas (2009-06-16 or later), available from the SkyBlueCanvas Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2115.title: SkyBlueCanvas admin.php path disclosure
CVE-2009-2115.body: SkyBlueCanvas could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker with administrative access could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.php script to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of SkyBlueCanvas (2009-06-16 or later), available from the SkyBlueCanvas Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2119.title: FirePass SSL VPN unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2119.body: FirePass SSL VPN is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the password field. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate patch for your system (Cumulative HotFix-603-3), available for registered users from the F5 Networks Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2121.title: Google Chrome HTTP response buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2121.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling HTTP responses. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP response, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (2.0.172.33 or later), available from the Google Chrome Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2122.title: Photoracer plugin for WordPress viewimg.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2122.body: The Photoracer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the viewimg.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2131.title: 4images HOMEPAGE cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2131.body: 4images is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the member.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using HOMEPAGE field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of 4images (1.7.7 or later), available from the 4images Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2133.title: Pivot pivot/tb.php path disclosure
CVE-2009-2133.body: Pivot could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the pivot/tb.php script using an invalid url parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2133.title: Pivot pivot/index.php and pivot/user.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2133.body: Pivot is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the pivot/index.php and pivot/user.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters and/or actions in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2147.title: phpWebThings fdown.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2147.body: phpWebThings is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the fdown.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2156.title: TorrentTrader viewrequests.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2156.body: TorrentTrader is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the viewrequests.php and torrents-upload.php scripts. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Title or Torrent Name field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2157.title: TorrentTrader report.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2157.body: TorrentTrader is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker with valid user credentials could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the report.php and takedelreq.php scripts using the user, torrent, forumid, forumpost or delreq[] parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2157.title: TorrentTrader modrules.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2157.body: TorrentTrader is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker with moderator privileges could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modrules.php, takedelreport.php, takewarndisable.php and admin-delreq.php scripts using the id, delreport[], warndisable[] or categ parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2157.title: TorrentTrader choice SQL injection
CVE-2009-2157.body: TorrentTrader is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker with valid user credentials could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the choice parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2157.title: TorrentTrader delreq.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2157.body: TorrentTrader is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker with privileges to delete requests could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the delreq.php script using the categ parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2157.title: TorrentTrader account-inbox.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2157.body: TorrentTrader is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker with valid credentials could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the account-inbox.php script when deleting a message using the origmsg parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2157.title: TorrentTrader browse.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2157.body: TorrentTrader is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the browse.php, today.php and torrents-details.php scripts using the wherecatin, limit or rwhere parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2159.title: TorrentTrader backup-database.php information disclosure
CVE-2009-2159.body: TorrentTrader could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by missing access controls on the backup-database.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a direct request to download the backup database and obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2160.title: TorrentTrader check.php information disclosure
CVE-2009-2160.body: TorrentTrader could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by missing access controls on the check.php script. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the full path, directory permissions and other sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2161.title: TorrentTrader ss_uri file include
CVE-2009-2161.body: TorrentTrader could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register_globals is enabled and magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin-functions.php script using the ss_uri parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2162.title: PukiWikiMod unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2162.body: PukiWikiMod is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of PukiWikiMod (1.6.7 or later), available from the XOOPS Maniac Web page. See References.

CVE-2009-2166.title: OCS Inventory NG cvs.php information disclosure
CVE-2009-2166.body: OCS Inventory NG could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the cvs.php script. By sending a direct request to the log parameter, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of OCS Inventory NG (1.02.1 or later), available from the OCS Inventory Next Generation Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2167.title: EgyPlus 7ml login.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2167.body: EgyPlus 7ml is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the username or password cookie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2176.title: fuzzylime (cms) confirm.php and display.php file include
CVE-2009-2176.body: fuzzylime (cms) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the code/confirm.php or code/display.php script using the list or template parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of fuzzylime (cms) (3.03b or later), available from the fuzzylime (cms) Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2177.title: fuzzylime (cms) display.php file overwrite
CVE-2009-2177.body: fuzzylime (cms) could allow a local attacker to overwrite arbitrary files, caused by improper validation by the display.php file. If magic_quotes is disabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "s" parameter to overwrite arbitrary files on the vulnerable system with the privileges of the Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of fuzzylime (cms) (3.03b or later), available from the fuzzylime (cms) Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2184.title: Gravy Media Photo Host file file download
CVE-2009-2184.body: Gravy Media Photo Host could allow a remote attacker to download arbitrary files, caused by improper verification by the forcedownload.php script prior to being used to read files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the file parameter to download arbitrary files from the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2188.title: Apple Safari EXIF metadata buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2188.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by ImageIO when processing EXIF metadata. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Safari (4.0.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For Mac OS X: Apply Security Update 2009-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2190.title: Apple Mac OS X launchd denial of service
CVE-2009-2190.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the launchd service. By opening multiple inetd-based launchd service connections, a remote attacker could prevent incoming connection requests from being serviced.Apply Security Update 2009-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2193.title: Apple Mac OS X AppleTalk kernel buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2193.body: Apple Mac OS X kernel is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling AppleTalk response packets. By sending a specially-crafted AppleTalk response packet, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel privileges or cause the system to crash.Apply Security Update 2009-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2198.title: Apple GarageBand Safari preferences information disclosure
CVE-2009-2198.body: Apple GarageBand could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. When GarageBand is opened, Safari's preferences are changed to always accept cookies. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of GarageBand (5.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2201.body: Apple Xsan could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information caused by not embedding credentials in the connection URL. If the Xsan Admin application is used during screensharing, the error dialog box displays the user's credentials in cleartext. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the password and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Xsan (2.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2206.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone AAC or MP3 buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2206.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone are vulnerable to multiple heap-based buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking when processing AAC or MP3 files by the CoreAudio component. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted AAC or MP3 file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch (3.1.1 or later) or Apple iPhone (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2207.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone MobileMail information disclosure
CVE-2009-2207.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by deleted emails being accessible in the MobileMail component. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using Spotlight search to view deleted messages and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch (3.1.1 or later) or Apple iPhone (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2208.title: FreeBSD SIOCSIFINFO_IN6 security bypass
CVE-2009-2208.body: FreeBSD could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by missing permission checks for the SIOCSIFINFO_IN6 IOCTL. By sending a specially-crafted SIOCSIFINFO_IN6 IOCTL, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions to modify IPv6 interface settings.Refer to FreeBSD-SA-09:10.ipv6 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2209.title: RS-CMS key SQL injection
CVE-2009-2209.body: RS-CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the rscms_mod_newsview.php script using the key parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2214.title: Citrix Secure Gateway unspecified denial of service
CVE-2009-2214.body: Citrix Secure Gateway is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending a specially-crafted request to the Gateway, a remote attacker could cause the system to consume all available CPU resources and deny service to new requests for connectivity.Refer to CTX121172 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2216.title: DirectAdmin CMD_REDIRECT cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2216.body: DirectAdmin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by CMD_REDIRECT. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the view parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2225.title: SureThing CD/DVD Labeler M3U buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2225.body: SureThing CD/DVD Labeler is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing M3U or PLS files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted M3U or PLS file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of SureThing CD/DVD Labeler (5.2.647.0 or later), available from the SureThing Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2227.title: Bopup Communication Server unspecified buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2227.body: Bopup Communication Server is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By sending a specially-crafted packet to TCP port 19810, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2231.title: MIDAS MIDAS cookie security bypass
CVE-2009-2231.body: MIDAS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the MIDAS cookie parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2232.title: Softbiz Banner Ad Management Script image.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2232.body: Softbiz Banner Ad Management Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the image.php script using the size_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2233.title: AWScripts Gallery Search Engine cookie security bypass
CVE-2009-2233.body: AWScripts Gallery Search Engine could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the awse_logged cookie parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2234.title: Call Center Suite admin.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2234.body: Call Center Suite is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin.php script using the username or password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (security_fix_admin_20090522.patch), available from the VICIDIAL Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2236.title: Your Articles Directory login.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2236.body: Your Article Directory is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the txtAdminEmail parameter, which could allow the attacker to bypass the authentication mechanism to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2239.title: Multiple casino components for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2239.body: Multiple casino components for Joomla! are vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the Itemid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.As a workaround for this vulnerability, uninstall the affected component.

CVE-2009-2241.title: ASP Inline Corporate Calendar search.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2241.body: ASP Inline Corporate Calendar is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the keyword parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2242.title: ASP Inline Corporate Calendar active_appointments.asp SQL injection
CVE-2009-2242.body: ASP Inline Corporate Calendar is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the active_appointments.asp script using the sortby or order parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2243.title: ASP Inline Corporate Calendar active_appointments.asp SQL injection
CVE-2009-2243.body: ASP Inline Corporate Calendar is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the active_appointments.asp script using the sortby or order parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2254.title: Zen Cart sqlpatch.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2254.body: Zen Cart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the sqlpatch.php script using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (security_patch_v138_20090619.zip), available from Zen Cart Support Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2255.title: Zen Cart record_company.php code execution
CVE-2009-2255.body: Zen Cart could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation by the record_company.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the frmdt_content parameter of the record_company_image array to execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (security_patch_v138_20090619.zip), available from Zen Cart Support Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2275.title: cPanel lastvisit.html directory traversal
CVE-2009-2275.body: cPanel could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the lastvisit.html script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the domain parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2292.title: a-News unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2292.body: a-News is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of July 17, 2010.

CVE-2009-2293.title: Tutorial Share cookie security bypass
CVE-2009-2293.body: Tutorial Share could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the usernamed cookie parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2302.title: Aardvark Topsites PHP index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2302.body: Aardvark Topsites PHP is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "q" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2303.title: Aardvark Topsites PHP index.php information disclosure
CVE-2009-2303.body: Aardvark Topsites PHP could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. By sending a direct request to the start or "u" parameter, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the full installation path.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2304.title: Aardvark Topsites PHP index.php information disclosure
CVE-2009-2304.body: Aardvark Topsites PHP could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. By sending a direct request to the start or "u" parameter, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the full installation path.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2307.title: CWGuestBook module for MDPro modules.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2307.body: CWGuestBook module for MDPro is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the rid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2308.title: Affiliation module for PunBB affiliates.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2308.body: The Affiliation module for PunBB is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the affiliates.php script using the in or out parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2310.title: Extensible-BioLawCom CMS (X-BLC) get_read.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2310.body: Extensible-BioLawCom CMS (X-BLC) is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the get_read.php script using the section parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2311.title: WBB3 rGallery userID SQL injection
CVE-2009-2311.body: WBB3 rGallery is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the userID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2325.title: Clicknet CMS index.php directory traversal
CVE-2009-2325.body: Clicknet CMS could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the side parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2337.title: Guestbook module for w3bcms index.inc.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2337.body: Guestbook module for w3bcms is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.inc.php script using the spam_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Guestbook module for w3bcms (3.5.0 or later), available from the w3bcms Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2347.title: LibTIFF rgb2ycbcr and tiff2rgba utility buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2347.body: LibTIFF is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the tiffcvt() and cvt_whole_image() functions within the rgb2ycbcr and tiff2rgba utility. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted TIFF image, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application that uses the affected library to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2360.title: The Passwd module for Horde main.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2360.body: The Passwd module for Horde is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the main.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the backend parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of the Passwd module (3.1.1 or later), available from the Horde Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2361.title: osTicket username SQL injection
CVE-2009-2361.body: osTicket is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the class.staff.php and class.config.php scripts using the username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.osTicket customers should contact osTicket support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2009-2362.title: AudioPLUS .lst and .m3u buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2362.body: AudioPLUS is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing .lst and .m3u files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .lst and .m3u file containing an overly long string, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2363.title: AudioPLUS .pls buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2363.body: AudioPLUS is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing .pls files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .pls file containing an overly long string, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2364.title: Mp3-Nator .plf buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2364.body: Mp3-Nator is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing .plf files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .plf file containing an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2366.title: Multiple Datacheck Solutions products login.asp SQL injection
CVE-2009-2366.body: Multiple Datacheck Solutions products are vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.asp script usimg the password or p_password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2367.title: Iomega StorCenter session identifiers security bypass
CVE-2009-2367.body: Iomega StorCenter could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the incremental generation of session identifiers. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using brute force techniques to gain unauthorized access to the admin interface.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2369.title: wxWidgets wxImage::Create() function buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2369.body: wxWidgets is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the wxImage::Create() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JPEG file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2376.title: TangoCMS value cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2376.body: TangoCMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Html::textarea() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the value parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of TangoCMS (2.3.0 or later), available from the TangoCMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2378.title: Jax FormMailer formmailer.admin.inc.php file include
CVE-2009-2378.body: Jax FormMailer could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the formmailer.admin.inc.php script using the BASE_DIR[jax_formmailer] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2379.title: BIGACE index.php file include
CVE-2009-2379.body: BIGACE could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the cmd parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the BIGACE Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2380.title: 4images functions.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2380.body: 4images is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the functions.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the 4images Forum & Community/4images Help / Hilfe/Bug Fixes & Patches Forum posting dated June 15, 2009, 11:38:42 AM. See References.

CVE-2009-2392.title: Virtue Online Test Generator text.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2392.body: Virtue Online Test Generator is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the text.php script using the tid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2393.title: Virtue Online Test Generator index.php authentication bypass
CVE-2009-2393.body: Virtue Online Test Generator could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass authentication, caused by improper restrictions on the index.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2401.title: PHPEcho CMS stealing.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2401.body: PHPEcho CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the stealing.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a forum post to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2405.title: JBoss Application Server createSnapshot.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2405.body: JBoss Application Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the createSnapshot.jsp and createThresholdMonitor.jsp scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.JBoss customers should contact JBoss support for upgrade or patch information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2417.title: cURL and libcurl certificate security bypass
CVE-2009-2417.body: cURL and libcurl could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper validation of a domain name in a signed CA certificate. By creating a specially-crafted certificate signed by a trusted Certificate Authority (CA) containing NULL terminators in the Common Name (CN) field, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to bypass security restrictions and cause the victim's client to accept spoofed SSL server certificates.Upgrade to the latest version of cURL (7.19.6 or later), available from the cURL Web page. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2419.title: Apple Safari servePendingRequests() denial of service
CVE-2009-2419.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a use-after-free error while invoking the servePendingRequests() function in the WebKit component. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to dereference invalid memory and cause the browser to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the WebKit development Repository. See References.

CVE-2009-2425.title: Tor router descriptors denial of service
CVE-2009-2425.body: Tor is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing malicious router descriptors. By sending specially-crafted router descriptors, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Tor (0.2.0.35 or later), available from the Tor Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2431.title: WordPress username information disclosure
CVE-2009-2431.body: WordPress could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the placement of an author's username in an HTML comment. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of WordPress (2.8.1 or later), available from the WordPress Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2432.title: WordPress and WordPress MU wp-settings.php path disclosure
CVE-2009-2432.body: WordPress and WordPress MU could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a direct request to the wp-settings.php script using an invalid parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of WordPress (2.8.1 or later), available from the WordPress Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2434.title: IBM AIX syscall buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2434.body: IBM AIX is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the syscall functionality. By using unknown attack vectors, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to IBM APARs IZ54713 and IZ54714 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2441.title: Online Guestbook Pro entry cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2441.body: Online Guestbook Pro is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the ogp_show.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the entry parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2443.title: Siteframe phpinfo.php information disclosure
CVE-2009-2443.body: Siteframe could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of the phpinfo.php script with insecure permissions inside the Web root. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Siteframe (5.0.6 or later), available from the Siteframe Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2444.title: ADbNewsSender maillinglist/setup/step1.php.inc file include
CVE-2009-2444.body: ADbNewsSender could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the maillinglist/setup/step1.php.inc script using the path_to_lang parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of ADbNewsSender (1.5.6 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2009-2450.title: Online Armor Personal Firewall OAmon.sys privilege escalation
CVE-2009-2450.body: Online Armor Personal Firewall could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper address space validation in the OAmon.sys driver. By sending a specially-crafted IOCTL request to \Device\OAmon, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Online-Armor (3.5.0.14 or later), available from the Online-Armor Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2460.title: mathTeX mathtex.cgi buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2460.body: mathTeX is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by the mathtex.cgi script. By using unknown attack vectors, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.mathTeX customers should contact mimeTeX support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2009-2461.title: mathTeX mathtex.cgi unspecified
CVE-2009-2461.body: An unspecified vulnerability in mathTeX related to the mathtex.cgi script creating insecure temporary files has an unknown impact and attack vector.mathTeX customers should contact mimeTeX support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2009-2473.title: neon XML denial of service
CVE-2009-2473.body: neon is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing XML entities. By persuading a victim to parse an XML document via a malicious WebDAV server or XML parsing interfaces (ne_xml), a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of all memory resources.Upgrade to the latest version of neon (0.28.6 or later), available from the neon Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2479.title: Mozilla Firefox unicode data denial of service
CVE-2009-2479.body: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a stack-based buffer overflow. By sending an overly long string of unicode data to the document.write method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the application to crash. Note: The details of this vulnerability have been disputed.Upgrade to the latest version of Mozilla Firefox (3.5.1 or later), available from the Mozilla Firefox Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2480.title: Movable Type mt-wizard.cgi cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2480.body: Movable Type is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the mt-wizard.cgi script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Movable Type (4.26 or later), available from the Movable Type Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2481.title: Movable Type mt-wizard.cgi security bypass
CVE-2009-2481.body: Movable Type could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an unspecified error in the mt-wizard.cgi script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to send e-mail to arbitrary addresses and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Movable Type (4.26 or later), available from the Movable Type Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2487.title: Sun Solaris Solaris IP Filter denial of service
CVE-2009-2487.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a Use-after-free error in the frpr_icmp function within the Solaris IP Filter. If the ipfilter is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to panic.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 260951 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2536.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer integer value denial of service
CVE-2009-2536.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an overly large integer value for the length property of a Select object to cause the browser to consume all available memory resources and crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2537.body: KDE Konqueror is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an overly large integer value for the length property of a Select object to cause the browser to consume all available memory resources and crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2538.title: Nokia N95 integer value denial of service
CVE-2009-2538.body: Nokia N95 is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an overly large integer value for the length property of a Select object to cause the browser to consume all available memory resources and crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2539.title: Aigo P8860 integer value denial of service
CVE-2009-2539.body: Aigo P8860 is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an overly large integer value for the length property of a Select object to cause the browser to consume all available memory resources and crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2540.title: Opera integer value denial of service
CVE-2009-2540.body: Opera is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an overly large integer value for the length property of a Select object to cause the browser to consume all available memory resources and crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2541.title: Sony PLAYSTATION 3 (PS3) integer value denial of service
CVE-2009-2541.body: The Web browser on Sony PLAYSTATION 3 (PS3) is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an overly large integer value for the length property of a Select object to cause the browser to consume all available memory resources and crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2545.title: Advanced Electron Forum filename SQL injection
CVE-2009-2545.body: Advanced Electron Forum (AEF) is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the filename when uploading attachments, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2546.title: Advanced Electron Forum (AEF) avatargalfile directory traversal
CVE-2009-2546.body: Advanced Electron Forum (AEF) could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request when changing the avatar image containing directory traversal sequences in the avatargalfile parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2547.title: Armed Assault VoIP over Network (VON) denial of service
CVE-2009-2547.body: Armed Assault and Armed Assault 2 are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of VoIP over Network (VON) protocol packets. By sending specially-crafted voice packets containing a negative packet_size value to UDP port 2305, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2552.title: Super Simple Blog Script comments.php file include
CVE-2009-2552.body: Super Simple Blog Script could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the comments.php script using the entry parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2553.title: Super Simple Blog Script comments.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2553.body: Super Simple Blog Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the comments.php script using the entry parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2554.title: Jobline component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2554.body: The Jobline component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the search parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.As a workaround for this vulnerability, uninstall the affected component.

CVE-2009-2555.title: Google Chrome JavaScript buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2555.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by src/jsregexp.cc in Google V8 when evaluating regular expressions in JavaScript. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code in the Google Chrome sandbox or cause the renderer (tab) to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (2.0.172.37 or later), available from the Google Chrome Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2556.title: Google Chrome buffers code execution
CVE-2009-2556.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the allocation of overly large memory buffers by a compromised renderer (tab) process. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker with the ability to run arbitrary code inside the renderer process could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the browser process and all the tabs to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (2.0.172.37 or later), available from the Google Chrome Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2558.title: Admin News Tools message.php security bypass
CVE-2009-2558.body: Admin News Tools could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the message.php script. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions to modify contents.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2564.title: Corel getPlus Download Manager NOS insecure permissions
CVE-2009-2564.body: Corel getPlus Download Manager could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by insecure permissions being set on the NOS installation directory. By replacing the getPlus_HelperSvc.exe service binary, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain escalated privileges on the system.getPlus Download Manager customers should contact Corel support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2009-2565.title: shiromuku(fs6)DIARY unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2565.body: shiromuku(fs6)DIARY is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.shiromuku(fs6)DIARY customers should contact Mrs. Shiromuku Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2566.title: MMPlayer M3U buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2566.body: TFM MMPlayer is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing M3U files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted M3U playlist file containing an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2568.title: Sorinara Streaming Audio Player .m3u buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2568.body: Sorinara Streaming Audio Player is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing .m3u files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .m3u file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2571.title: VerliAdmin index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2571.body: VerliAdmin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the nick or "q" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2572.title: The Fivestar module for Drupal unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-2572.body: The Fivestar module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to hijack the authentication of arbitrary users for requests that cast votes. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2009-025 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2573.body: MiniTwitter is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.phpand rss.php scripts using the user parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of MiniTwitter (0.3 beta or later), available from SourceForge.net. See References.

CVE-2009-2574.body: MiniTwitter could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper verification of user credentials by the index.php. By sending a direct request, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions to change user passwords on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of MiniTwitter (0.3 beta or later), available from SourgeForge.net. See References.

CVE-2009-2581.body: Multiple EditeurScripts products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the modifier.php script. CVE-2009-2585.body: mlffat is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2009-2589.title: Hutscripts PHP Website Script msg cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2589.body: Hutscripts PHP Website Script is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the feedback.php, index.php and lostpassword.php scripts. CVE-2009-2593.body: Censura is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2009-2594.body: Censura is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the censura.php script. CVE-2009-2595.body: Censura is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the productSearch.html script. CVE-2009-2599.body: RadClassifieds is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2009-2604.body: Zen Help Desk is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2009-2609.body: The amoCourse component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2009-2618.body: The Survey module for MDPro is vulnerable to SQL injection.
