CVE-2009-2627.title: Acer AcerCtrls.APlunch ActiveX control code execution
CVE-2009-2627.body: The Acer AcerCtrls.APlunch ActiveX control (acerctrl.ocx) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on a system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site that passes specially-crafted arguments to the insecure Run() method, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2640.title: Interlogy Profile Manager pmadm cookie security bypass
CVE-2009-2640.body: Interlogy Profile Manager could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the pmadm cookie, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2640.title: Interlogy Profile Manager Basic cookie security bypass
CVE-2009-2640.body: Interlogy Profile Manager Basic could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies by the admin.cgi script. By modifying the pmadm cookie, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2648.title: Flashden Guestbook phpinfo.php information disclosure
CVE-2009-2648.body: Flashden Guestbook could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the phpinfo.php file stored inside the Web root. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could obtain PHP configuration information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2651.title: Asterisk RTP text frames denial of service
CVE-2009-2651.body: Asterisk is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing RTP text frames. By sending specially-crafted RTP text frames, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to crash.Refer to AST-2009-004 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2655.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer mshtml.dll denial of service
CVE-2009-2655.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the mshtml.dll library. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that calls the JavaScript findText method with a crafted Unicode string in the first argument and only one additional argument, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2660.title: CamlImages gifread.c and jpegread.c buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2660.body: CamlImages is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by multiple integer overflows in gifread.c and jpegread.c. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted GIF or JPEG file with overly large width and height values, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2663.title: libvorbis codec headers denial of service
CVE-2009-2663.body: libvorbis, as used in Mozilla Firefox, is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by various errors when processing codec file headers. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .ogg file, a remote attacker could corrupt arbitrary memory or cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of libvorbis (1.2.3 or later), available from the xiph.org Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2670.title: Sun JRE and JDK audio system privilege escalation
CVE-2009-2670.body: Sun JRE and JDK could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an unspecified error related to the audio system. By persuading a victim to launch a trusted applet or Java Web Start application, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to java.lang.System properties and possibly launch further attacks against the system with elevated privileges.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 263408 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2672.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment proxy session hijacking
CVE-2009-2672.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by the failure to prevent access to browser cookies by the proxy mechanism implementation. By persuading a victim to launch an untrusted applet or Java Web Start application, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain browser cookies and hijack a victim's session and gain the victim's privileges.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 263409 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2673.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment proxy security bypass
CVE-2009-2673.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the proxy mechanism implementation. By persuading a victim to launch an untrusted applet or Java Web Start application, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to establish a non-authorized socket or URL connection to restricted hosts.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 263409 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2674.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment JPEG buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2674.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow when parsing custom JPEG splash screen images for a WebStart application. By persuading a victim to launch an untrusted applet or Java Web Start application, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 263428 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2675.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) Pack200 buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2675.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow when parsing the header of Pack200 compressed Jar files during decompression. By persuading a victim to visit a Web page containing an untrusted Java Web Start application, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with privileges of the victim or cause the browser to crash.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 263488 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2677.title: HP Insight Control Suite For Linux (ICE-LX) cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-2677.body: HP Insight Control Suite For Linux (ICE-LX) is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could use an unspecified attack vector to perform actions on behalf of the user. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to HPSBMA02447 SSRT090062 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2682.title: HP-UX RBSC unauthorized access
CVE-2009-2682.body: An unspecified vulnerability in HP-UX, when running Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), could allow a local attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system.Refer to HPSBUX02457 SSRT090174 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2684.title: Multiple HP LaserJet printers and HP Digital Senders unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2684.body: Multiple HP products, including HP LaserJet printers and HP Digital Senders, are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Product_URL or Tech_URL parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to HPSBPI02463 SSRT090061 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2009-2687.title: PHP exif_read_data() denial of service
CVE-2009-2687.body: PHP is vulnerable to a denial of service caused by the improper validation of input by the exif_read_data() function. By sending a specially-crafted jpeg image file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a segmentation fault.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.10 or later), available from the PHP Web site. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JPEG file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PNG file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. CVE-2009-2691.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the mm_for_maps() function. CVE-2009-2693.body: Apache Tomcat could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. CVE-2009-2734.body: Achievo is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2009-2742.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in Eclipse Help. CVE-2009-2746.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Administration Console. CVE-2009-2748.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in the Administration Console. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. See References. For WebSphere Application Server 7.1: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.7 or later) or APAR PK92057. See References.

CVE-2009-2749.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server V7 Feature Pack for Communications Enabled Applications (CEA) collaboration sesssion spoofing
CVE-2009-2749.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server V7 Feature Pack for Communications Enabled Applications (CEA) could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the use of predictable session values. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to spoof a collaboration session.For IBM WebSphere Application Server Feature Pack for Communications Enabled Applications (CEA) 7: Apply the latest Fix Pack (1.0.0.1 or later) or APAR PM00435. See References.

CVE-2009-2751.title: IBM WebSphere Commerce encryption key weak security
CVE-2009-2751.body: IBM WebSphere Commerce could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the use of a single merchant key provided by the administrator for session and data encryption. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to compromise the integrity of WebSphere Commerce sites.Refer to IBM APAR JR35136 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2752.title: IBM WebSphere Commerce encryption scheme weak security
CVE-2009-2752.body: IBM WebSphere Commerce could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error in the encryption scheme. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.For WebSphere Application Server 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.1 or later) or APAR PK77505. See References.

CVE-2009-2754.title: IBM Informix Dynamic Server librpc.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2754.body: IBM Informix Dynamic Server is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by a signedness error in the librpc.dll RPC protocol parsing library as used by the ISM Portmapper service (portmap.exe) binary. By sending and overly long parameter during authentication, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.For IBM Informix Dynamic Server 10: Apply the latest Fix Pack (10.00.TC10 or later) or APAR IC55329. See References. For IBM Informix Dynamic Server 11: Apply the latest Fix Pack (11.10.TC3 or later) or APAR IC55330. See References. For EMC Legato Networker: Apply the appropriate patch for your system (ESA-08-007), available for registered users from the EMC Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2767.title: Linux Kernel clock_nanosleep() function privilege escalation
CVE-2009-2767.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error in the clock_nanosleep() function. By issuing a call to the affected function with the clock id set to CLOCK_MONOTONIC_RAW, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a kernel oops or possibly gain elevated privileges on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2009-2770.title: PowerUpload cookie security bypass
CVE-2009-2770.body: powerUpload could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the myadminname cookie parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2772.title: PG Roommate Finder Solution part parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2772.body: PG Roommate Finder Solution is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the quick_search.php and viewprofile.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the part parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2773.title: PHP Paid 4 Mail Script home.php file include
CVE-2009-2773.body: PHP Paid 4 Mail Script could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the home.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2777.title: GarageSalesJunkie view.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2777.body: GarageSalesJunkie is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the view.php script using the key parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2778.title: GarageSalesJunkie view.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2778.body: GarageSalesJunkie is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the view.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the key parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2780.title: 68 Classifieds multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2780.body: 68 Classifieds is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (function.list_templates.php.zip , available from the 68 Classifieds Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2786.title: Reputation module for PunBB poster SQL injection
CVE-2009-2786.body: The Reputation module for PunBB is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the reputation.php script using the poster parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2787.title: Reputation module for PunBB rep_profile.php file include
CVE-2009-2787.body: The Reputation module for PunBB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the rep_profile.php script using the pun_user[language] parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2789.title: Permis component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2789.body: The Permis component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.As a workaround for this vulnerability, uninstall the affected component.

CVE-2009-2790.title: Softbiz Dating Script cat_products.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2790.body: Softbiz Dating Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the cat_products.php script using the cid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2795.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone Recovery Mode buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2795.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Recovery Mode component. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors related to command parsing to could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch (3.1.1 or later) or Apple iPhone (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2796.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone password information disclosure
CVE-2009-2796.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper handling of passwords in UIKit. When characters in a password are deleted and the deletion is cancelled, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view the password and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch (3.1.1 or later) or Apple iPhone (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2797.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone referer header information disclosure
CVE-2009-2797.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the inclusion of passwords and usernames in the URL within the referer header by Safari. By reading Referer logs on a Web server, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain user credentials and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch (3.1.1 or later) or Apple iPhone (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2800.title: Apple Mac OS X Alias file buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2800.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Alias Manager when processing alias files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Alias file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-005, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2803.title: Apple Mac OS X Resource Manager code execution
CVE-2009-2803.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the CarbonCore component when processing resource forks. By persuading a victim to open a file with a malicious resource fork, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-005, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2804.title: Apple Mac OS X ColorSync buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2804.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow when processing embedded ColorSync profiles. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image containing an embedded ColorSync profile, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-005, available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2805.title: Apple Mac OS X JBIG2 buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2805.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow by the CoreGraphics component when handling a malformed JBIG2 image stream embedded within a PDF document. By persuading a victim to open a malicious PDF file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-005, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2807.title: Apple Mac OS X CUPS USB buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2807.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by CUPS USB backend. By sending a specially-crafted request, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-005, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2809.title: Apple Mac OS X ImageIO code execution
CVE-2009-2809.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of PixarFilm-encoded TIFF images by the ImageIO component. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PixarFilm-encoded TIFF image, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-005, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2811.title: Apple Mac OS X Launch Services code execution
CVE-2009-2811.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the failure to display a warning by the Launch Services component when handling files having a ".fileloc" extension. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted ".fileloc" file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute a malicious payload.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-005, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2813.title: Apple Mac OS X SMB security bypass
CVE-2009-2813.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the SMB component. By connecting to the Windows File Sharing service, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass restrictions to gain unauthorized access to file system content without a configured home directory.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-005, available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2814.title: Apple Mac OS X Wiki Server cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2814.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using search requests containing non UTF-8 encoded data to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-005, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2816.title: Apple Safari Cross-Origin Resource Sharing cross-site srequest forgery
CVE-2009-2816.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the WebKit's implementation of Cross-Origin Resource Sharing. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a preflight request from a page in a different origin containing specially-crafted HTTP headers to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of Safari (4.0.4 or later), available from the Apple Safari Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2846.title: Linux Kernel eisa_eeprom_read security bypass
CVE-2009-2846.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the eisa_eeprom_read function in the parisc isa-eeprom component. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a negative ppos argument to bypass a security check and cause an out-of-bounds read in the readb function to access restricted memory.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2009-2848.title: Linux Kernel execve function denial of service
CVE-2009-2848.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper clearing of the current->clear_child_tid pointer by the execve function. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a clone system call with CLONE_CHILD_SETTID or CLONE_CHILD_CLEARTID enabled to corrupt memory to cause a denial of service.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2852.title: WP-Syntax plugin for WordPress index.php code execution
CVE-2009-2852.body: The WP-Syntax plugin for WordPress could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php file. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the test_filter[wp_head] array to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2855.title: Squid strListGetItem() denial of service
CVE-2009-2855.body: Squid is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the strListGetItem() function when parsing external authentication headers when the external_acl_type configuration option defines a delimiter other than a comma. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via an authentication header containing a comma delimiting character to cause an infinite loop.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2865.title: Cisco IOS Communications Manager Express (CME) extension buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2865.body: Multiple Cisco IOS devices that are configured for Cisco Unified Communications Manager Express (CME) and the Extension Mobility feature are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the login section of the Extension Mobility feature when auto-registration is enabled. By sending specially-crafted HTTP requests, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Refer to cisco-sa-20090923-cme for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2875.title: Cisco WebEx WRF Player buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2875.body: The Cisco WebEx WRF Player is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by atas32.dll when processing WRF files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted WebEx Recording Format (WRF) file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20091216-webex for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2876.title: Cisco WebEx WRF Player buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2876.body: The Cisco WebEx WRF Player is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by atas32.dll when processing WRF files. CVE-2009-2879.body: The Cisco WebEx WRF Player is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by atas32.dll when processing WRF files. See References.

CVE-2009-2880.title: Cisco WebEx WRF Player buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2880.body: The Cisco WebEx WRF Player is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by atas32.dll when processing WRF files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted WebEx Recording Format (WRF) file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20091216-webex for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2881.title: Basilic index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2881.body: Basilic is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the idAuthor parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2883.title: SaphpLesson login.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2883.body: SaphpLesson is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the username or password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2884.title: PHP Scripts Now World's Tallest Buildings bios.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2884.body: PHP Scripts Now World's Tallest Buildings is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the bios.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the rank parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2885.title: PHP Scripts Now World's Tallest Buildings bios.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2885.body: PHP Scripts Now World's Tallest Buildings is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the bios.php script using rank parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2886.title: PHP Scripts Now World's Tallest Buildings bios.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2886.body: PHP Scripts Now World's Tallest Buildings is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the bios.php script using rank parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2887.title: PHP Scripts Now World's Tallest Buildings bios.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2887.body: PHP Scripts Now World's Tallest Buildings is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the bios.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the rank parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2888.title: Hangman index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2888.body: Hangman is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the "n" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2890.title: PHP Scripts Now Riddles results.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2890.body: PHP Scripts Now Riddles is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the results.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the searchquery parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2891.title: PHP Scripts Now Riddles list.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2891.body: PHP Scripts Now Riddles is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the list.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2894.title: eBay Clone cid SQL injection
CVE-2009-2894.body: eBay Clone is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the product_desc.php, showcategory.php and gallery.php scripts using the cid or id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2896.title: KMPlayer .srt buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2896.body: KMPlayer is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing malicious .srt files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .srt playlist file containing an overly long entry, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2897.title: Hyperic HQ mastheadAttach.do cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2897.body: Hyperic HQ is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the mastheadAttach.do, Resource.do and UserAdmin.do Java Servlet files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the typeId, eid or "u" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Spring Source Web Page for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2898.title: Hyperic HQ Description cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2898.body: Hyperic HQ is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when visiting the Alerts list. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Description parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Spring Source Web Page for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-2901.title: Apache Tomcat autoDeploy attribute security bypass
CVE-2009-2901.body: Apache Tomcat could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when setting the autoDeploy attribute for directories placed in the hosts's appBase. Following a failed undeploy, some arbitrary files are autodeployed with improper access restrictions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions to gain unauthorized access to normally restricted files.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Apache SVN Repository. See References. Reportedly, this vulnerability will be fixed in a future release of Tomcat available from the Apache Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2919.title: Orca topic title cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2919.body: Orca is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the topic title field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of May 29, 2010.

CVE-2009-2921.title: PHP News login.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2921.body: PHP News is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the user field, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2922.title: Pixaria Gallery image.php directory traversal
CVE-2009-2922.body: Pixaria Gallery could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the image.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the file parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (pixaria.image.php), available from the Pixaria Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2925.title: DJ Calendar DJcalendar.cgi directory traversal
CVE-2009-2925.body: DJ Calendar could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the DJcalendar.cgi script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the TEMPLATE parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2926.title: PHP Competition System show_matchs.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2926.body: PHP Competition System is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the show_matchs.php or persons.php script using the competition or pageno parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2927.title: DS CMS DetailFile.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2927.body: DS CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the DetailFile.php script using the nFileId parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2928.title: TGS Content Management login.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2928.body: TGS Content Management is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the previous_page parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2929.title: TGS Content Management index.php and frontpage_ception.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-2929.body: TGS Content Management is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php or frontpage_ception.php script using various parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2934.title: PIPL .pls or .pl buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2934.body: PIPL is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing playlist files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .PLS or .PL playlist file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2935.title: Google Chrome V8 security bypass
CVE-2009-2935.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the Google V8 Javascript engine. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass intended restrictions on reading memory to obtain sensitive information and possibly execute arbitrary code in the Chrome sandbox.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (2.0.172.43 or later), available from the Google Chrome Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2948.title: Samba mount.cifs information disclosure
CVE-2009-2948.body: Samba could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to check if privileges are crossed when opening a credentials file by the mount.cifs application. If mount.cifs is suid root, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "--verbose" or "-v" option to disclose restricted file content.Upgrade to the latest version of Samba (3.0.37, 3.2.15, 3.3.8, or 3.4.2 or later), available from the Samba Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2949.title: OpenOffice.org XPM file buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2949.body: OpenOffice.org is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error in XPMReader::ReadXPM. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted XPM image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenOffice.org (3.2 or later), available from the OpenOffice.org Web site. See References. Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2950.title: OpenOffice.org GIF file buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2950.body: OpenOffice.org is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by a memory corruption in GIFLZWDecompressor::GIFLZWDecompressor. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted GIF image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenOffice.org (3.2 or later), available from the OpenOffice.org Web site. See References. Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2951.title: Phenotype CMS salt value information disclosure
CVE-2009-2951.body: Phenotype CMS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to use a random salt value when encrypting passwords. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view the password in cleartext and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Phenotype CMS (2.9 or later), available from the Phenotype CMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2961.title: KOL Player .mp3 buffer overflow
CVE-2009-2961.body: KOL Player is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing .MP3 files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .MP3 playlist file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-2964.title: SquirrelMail unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-2964.body: SquirrelMail is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to modify user preferences, delete emails, and potentially send emails. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of SquirrelMail (1.4.20 RC1 or later), available from the SquirrelMail Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-2966.title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus and Kaspersky Internet Security HTTP requests denial of service
CVE-2009-2966.body: Kaspersky Anti-Virus and Kaspersky Internet Security are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in avp.exe when parsing URLs containing multiple dot characters. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted URL link, a remote attacker could cause the avp.exe process to consume all available CPU resources and hang.Kaspersky Anti-Virus and Kaspersky Internet Security customers should contact Kaspersky support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2009-2967.title: Buildbot unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-2967.body: Buildbot is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Buildbot (0.7.11p3 or later), available from the Buildbot Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2973.title: Google Chrome hashed algorithm spoofing
CVE-2009-2973.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to spoof certificates, caused by the use of weak MD2 and MD4 hash algorithms. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using collision attacks to spoof an invalid site as a valid HTTPS site.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (2.0.172.43 or later), available from the Google Chrome Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-2977.title: Cisco Security Monitoring, Analysis and Response System log/sysbacktrace information disclosure
CVE-2009-2977.body: Cisco Security Monitoring, Analysis and Response System (CS-MARS) could allow a remote attacker from within the local network to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of passwords in log/sysbacktrace.## files within error-logs.tar.gz archives in cleartext. By reading the restricted files an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3001.title: Linux Kernel AF_LLC getsockname() information disclosure
CVE-2009-3001.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in af_llc.c. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via the AF_LLC getsockname() function to obtain kernel stack memory information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2009-3009.title: Ruby on Rails unicode strings cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3009.body: Ruby on Rails is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the escaping code for the form helpers. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unicode strings to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Reportedly, this vulnerability will be fixed in a future release of Ruby on Rails (2.3.4 or 2.2.3), available from the Ruby on Rails Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-3010.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey data cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3010.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by the improper blocking of data: URIs in Refresh headers in HTTP responses. By injecting a Refresh header that contains JavaScript sequences in a data:text/html URI or entering a data:text/html URI with JavaScript sequences when specifying the content of a Refresh header, a remote attacker could inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3013.title: Opera data cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3013.body: Opera is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by the improper blocking of data: URIs in Location headers in HTTP responses. By injecting a Location header that contains JavaScript sequences in a data:text/html URI or entering a data:text/html URI with JavaScript sequences when specifying the content of a Location header, a remote attacker could inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3014.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey javascript cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3014.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by the improper handling of javascript: URIs in HTML links within 302 error documents sent from web servers. By injecting a Location HTTP response header or specifying the content of a Location HTTP response header, a remote attacker could inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3015.title: QtWeb javascript cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3015.body: QtWeb is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by the improper blocking of javascript: and data: URIs in Refresh headers. By injecting a Refresh header that contains a javascript: URI, entering a javascript: URI when specifying the content of a Refresh header, injecting a Refresh header that contains JavaScript sequences in a data:text/html URI, or entering a data:text/html URI with JavaScript sequences when specifying the content of a Refresh header, injecting a Location header that contains JavaScript sequences in a data:text/html URI, or entering a data:text/html URI with JavaScript sequences when specifying the content of a Location header, a remote attacker could inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3016.title: Apple Safari javascript cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3016.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by the improper blocking of javascript: and data: URIs in Refresh headers. By injecting a Refresh header that contains a javascript: URI, entering a javascript: URI when specifying the content of a Refresh header, injecting a Refresh header that contains JavaScript sequences in a data:text/html URI, or entering a data:text/html URI with JavaScript sequences when specifying the content of a Refresh header in an HTTP response, a remote attacker could inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3017.title: Orca Browser data cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3017.body: Orca Browser is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by the improper blocking of data: URIs in Refresh and Location headers in HTTP responses. By injecting a Refresh header that contains JavaScript sequences in a data:text/html URI, entering a data:text/html URI with JavaScript sequences when specifying the content of a Refresh header, injecting a Location header that contains JavaScript sequences in a data:text/html URI, or entering a data:text/html URI with JavaScript sequences when specifying the content of a Location header, injecting a Location HTTP response header or specifying the content of a Location HTTP response header and improperly handling javascript: URIs in HTML links within 302 error documents sent from web servers, a remote attacker could inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3018.title: Maxthon Browser javascript cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3018.body: Maxthon Browser is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by the improper blocking of javascript: and data: URIs in Refresh headers in HTTP responses and the data: URIs in Location headers. By injecting a Refresh header that contains a javascript: URI, entering a javascript: URI when specifying the content of a Refresh header, injecting a Refresh header that contains JavaScript sequences in a data:text/html URI, entering a data:text/html URI with JavaScript sequences when specifying the content of a Refresh header, injecting a Location header that contains JavaScript sequences in a data:text/html URI or entering a data:text/html URI with JavaScript sequences when specifying the content of a Location header; and improperly handling javascript: URIs in HTML links within 301 and 302 error documents sent from web servers, injecting a Location HTTP response header or specifying the content of a Location HTTP response header, a remote attacker could inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3022.title: Bingo!CMS unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-3022.body: bingo!CMS is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could perform unspecified administrative tasks on behalf of the user. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of bingo!CMS (1.0a, 1.1b, or 1.2a or later), available from the Bingo!CMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3026.title: Pidgin libpurple weak security
CVE-2009-3026.body: Pidgin could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error in protocols/jabber/auth.c in libpurple. When connecting to Jabber servers that are not using XMPP specifications, the "require TLS/SSL" option is not invoked and libpurple will connect to the server with weak encryption. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to sniff a victim's session.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-3027.title: Multiple Symantec products VRTSweb code execution
CVE-2009-3027.body: Multiple Symantec products shipped with the Veritas VRTSweb shared component could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of authentication requests. By sending a specially-crafted request to TCP port 14300, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with administrative privileges.Refer to SYM09-017 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-3030.title: Symantec SecurityExpressions Audit and Compliance Server error response cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3030.body: Symantec SecurityExpressions Audit and Compliance Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious HTML script into an error message which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the error message is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SYM09-014 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3033.title: Symantec Altiris ConsoleUtilities ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3033.body: The Symantec Altiris ConsoleUtilities ActiveX control (AeXNSConsoleUtilities.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string to the second argument of the RunCmd() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Refer to SYM09-016 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3041.title: SPIP unspecified unauthorized access
CVE-2009-3041.body: An unspecified vulnerability in SPIP could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the application using unknown attack vectors.Upgrade to the latest version of SPIP (2.0.9 or 1.9.2i or later), available from the SPIP Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3053.title: Agora component for Joomla! index.php file include
CVE-2009-3053.body: The Agora component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the action parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Agora (3.0.01Stable or later), available from the JoomlaMe Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3054.title: Art Portal component for Joomla! portalid SQL injection
CVE-2009-3054.body: The Art Portal component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the portalid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Art Portal (1.0.1 or later), available from the Artetics.com Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3081.title: Uiga Church Portal index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3081.body: Uiga Church Portal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the year, month or id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3102.title: Zmanda Recovery Manager for MySQL mysqlhotcopy privilege escalation
CVE-2009-3102.body: Zmanda Recovery Manager (ZRM) for MySQL could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper validation of input by socket-server.pl. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a specially-crafted packet to control the mysqlhotcopy script before being called by the system() function to execute arbitrary code on the system with MySQL user privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3102.title: Zmanda Recovery Manager for MySQL socket-server.pl command execution
CVE-2009-3102.body: Zmanda Recovery Manager (ZRM) for MySQL could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of input by socket-server.pl before calling the system() function. By sending a specially-crafted request in a packet to TCP port 25300, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the victim's system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3105.title: IBM Lotus Domino Web Access unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3105.body: IBM Lotus Domino Web Access is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Hotfix 211.241), available from the IBM Support and Downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3106.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server doGet and doTrace methods security bypass
CVE-2009-3106.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper handling of security constraints on the doGet and doTrace methods used by Web Applications. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP HEAD method, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a Web Application that only specifies a protection constraint for a GET and POST request, and there is not a constraint placed on the HEAD method to bypass security restrictions and obtain sensitive information. Note: If an application does not define a security constraint for the TRACE method and the default doTrace method gets called, the TRACE request will be rejected with a 403 status code.For WebSphere Application Server 6.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.0.2.37 or later) or APAR PK83258. See References. For WebSphere Application Server 6.1: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.1.0.27 or later) or APAR PK83258. See References. For WebSphere Application Server 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.7 or later) or APAR PK83258. See References.

CVE-2009-3116.title: Uiga Church Portal index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3116.body: Uiga Church Portal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the year, month or id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3117.body: Silurus Classifieds System is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2009-3121.title: Ajax Table module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3121.body: The Ajax Table module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3122.body: The Ajax Table module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper authentication checking in the module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to delete arbitrary users and nodes.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3123.title: Wap-Motor gallery.php directory traversal
CVE-2009-3123.body: Wap-Motor could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. CVE-2009-3146.title: ArticleFriend Script search_advance.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3146.body: ArticleFriend Script is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search_advance.php script. CVE-2009-3151.title: Ultrize TimeSheet downloadFile.php directory traversal
CVE-2009-3151.body: Ultrize TimeSheet could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the downloadFile.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the fileName parameter to download and read arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3152.body: NTSOFT BBS E-Market Professional is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page, bt_code and bt_no parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. CVE-2009-3153.body: MP3 Search Engine is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3156.title: Date module for Drupal date tools cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3156.body: The Date module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by field labels when creating a new content type. CVE-2009-3202.body: ULoKI PHP Forum is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.php script. CVE-2009-3203.body: AJ Auction is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2009-3204.title: Stiva Forum forum.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3204.body: Stiva Forum is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the demo.php, forum.php and include_forum.php scripts. CVE-2009-3205.body: CBAuthority ClickBank Affiliate Management is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2009-3207.body: The ImageCache module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper checking of access to originals when generating derivative images. CVE-2009-3209.title: PHP Email Manager remove.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3209.body: PHP Email Manager is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the remove.php script using the ID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3210.title: The Printer, e-mail and PDF module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3210.body: The Printer, e-mail and PDF module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2009-3213.title: broid .mp3 buffer overflow

CVE-2009-3639.title: ProFTPD mod_tls SSL certificate security bypass
CVE-2009-3639.body: ProFTPD could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper validation of a domain name in a signed CA certificate by the mod_tls module. By creating a specially-crafted certificate signed by a trusted Certificate Authority (CA) containing NULL characters in the subjectAltName field, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to bypass security restrictions and cause the victim's client to accept spoofed SSL server certificates. Note: The UseReverseDNS and TLSVerifyClient need to be enabled and the TLSOptions should be set to dNSNameRequired in order to exploit this vulnerability.Upgrade to the latest version of ProFTPD (1.3.2b or 1.3.3 rc2 or later), available from the ProFTPD Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-3640.title: Linux Kernel update_cr8_intercept() denial of service
CVE-2009-3640.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of the absence of an Advanced Programmable Interrupt Controller (APIC) by the KVM (Kernel-based Virtual Machine) update_cr8_intercept() function. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to trigger a NULL pointer dereference to cause the computer to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2009-3646.title: NaviCOPA Web Server source information disclosure
CVE-2009-3646.body: NaviCOPA Web Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper processing of HTTP requests. By appending a ::$DATA attribute to arbitrary files on the server, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view the source code of the targeted file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3647.title: YABSoft Mega File Hosting Script emaillinks.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3647.body: YABSoft Mega File Hosting Script is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the emaullinks.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the moudi parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3648.title: Service Links module for Drupal content type names cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3648.body: The Service Links module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when displaying content type names. A remote attacker with administer content types permissions could exploit this vulnerability using the content type name field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 2009.

CVE-2009-3650.title: Dex module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3650.body: The Dex module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3651.title: Browscap module for Drupal User-Agent HTTP header cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3651.body: The Browscap module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the User-Agent HTTP header to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-065 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3652.title: Organic Groups module for Drupal new groups cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3652.body: The Organic Groups module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when creating new groups. A remote attacker with permission to create or edit group nodes could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-066 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3656.title: Shared Sign On module for Drupal unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-3656.body: The Shared Sign-On module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to perform arbitrary tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-069 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3657.title: Shared Sign On module for Drupal unspecified session hijacking
CVE-2009-3657.body: The Shared Sign On module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted link and log into the application, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack another user's account and gain the victim's privileges.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-069 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3658.title: AOL SuperBuddy ActiveX control code execution
CVE-2009-3658.body: The AOL SuperBuddy ActiveX control (sb.dll) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an argument to the insecure SetSuperBuddy() method, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3659.title: BS Counter stats.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3659.body: BS Counter is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the stats.php script using the page parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3664.title: Nullam Blog index.php file include
CVE-2009-3664.body: Nullam Blog could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the "p" or "s" parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Nullam Blog (0.1.3 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3665.title: Nullam Blog index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3665.body: Nullam Blog is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using "i" or "v" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Nullam Blog (0.1.3 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3666.title: Nullam Blog index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3666.body: Nullam Blog is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "e" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Nullam Blog (0.1.3 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3678.title: Microsoft Windows Canonical Display Driver (cdd.dll) code execution
CVE-2009-3678.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper parsing of information copied from user mode to kernel mode by the Canonical Display Driver (cdd.dll). By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site or view a malicious image file using an affected application that uses the APIs for GDI for rendering images, a remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the system to stop responding.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS10-043. See References.

CVE-2009-3691.title: Multiple IBM Informix products .nfx buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3691.body: Multiple IBM Informix products are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing .nfx files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .nfx file containing an overly long HostList entry, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to IBM APAR IC64356 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3694.title: ezRecipe-Zee config.php file include
