CVE-2009-3694.body: ezRecipe-Zee could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the config.php script using the cfg[prePath] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3697.title: phpMyAdmin PDF schema generator SQL injection
CVE-2009-3697.body: phpMyAdmin is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the PDF schema generator feature using unspecified interface parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of phpMyAdmin (3.2.2.1 or 2.11.9.6 or later), available from The phpMyAdmin Project Web site. See References. For other didtributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-3699.title: IBM AIX rpc.cmsd buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3699.body: IBM AIX is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Calendar Manager Service Daemon (rpc.cmsd). By sending a specially-crafted request containing an overly long argument to remote procedure 21, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges or cause the system to crash.Refer to the IBM SECURITY ADVISORY for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3701.title: Multiple Horde products administration interface cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3701.body: Multiple Horde products, when used with Firefox browsers, are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the administration interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For Horde: Upgrade to the latest version of Horde (3.3.6 (final) or later), available from the Horde Project Web site. See References. For Horde Groupware or Horde Groupware Webmail Edition: Upgrade to the latest version of Horde Groupware or Webmail (1.2.5 (final) or later), available from the Horde Project Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3711.title: httpdx h_handlepeer() buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3711.body: httpdx is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the h_handlepeer() function. By sending an overly long HTTP GET request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of httpdx (1.4.4 or later), available from the Sourceforge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3712.title: eBay Clone feedback.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3712.body: eBay Clone is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the feedback.php, view_full_size.php, classifide_ad.php and the crosspromoteitems.php scripts using the user_id or item_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3713.title: MorcegoCMS fichero.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3713.body: MorcegoCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the fichero.php script uisng the query string, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3714.title: MCshoutbox admin_login.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3714.body: MCshoutbox is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin_login.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the loginerror parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3715.title: MCshoutbox scr_login.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3715.body: MCshoutbox is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the scr_login.php script using the username or password parameter, which could allow the attacker to bypass the authentication mechanism to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3716.title: MCshoutbox smilie file upload
CVE-2009-3716.body: MCshoutbox could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions of uploaded smilie image files by the admin.php script. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker with admin privileges could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3719.title: Battle Blog comment.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3719.body: Battle Blog is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the comment.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the email form field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3745.title: IBM Rational AppScan help pages cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3745.body: IBM Rational AppScan is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input to the help pages. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a query string URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM SWG 24024704 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3747.title: TBmnetCMS index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3747.body: TBmnetCMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the content parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3750.title: ToyLog read.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3750.body: ToyLog is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the read.php script using the idm parameter, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands and view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3751.title: Opial home.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3751.body: Opial is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the home.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the genres_parent parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3781.title: FileField module for Drupal node-access security bypass
CVE-2009-3781.body: The FileField module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to restrict access to specific files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass node access restrictions.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-082 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3782.title: User Points module for Drupal userpoint information disclosure
CVE-2009-3782.body: An unspecified error in the User Points module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker with "View own userpoints" permission could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to view another user's userpoints data.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2009-077 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3783.title: Simplenews Statistics module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3783.body: The Simplenews Statistics module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-080 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3785.title: Simplenews Statistics module for Drupal unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-3785.body: Simplenews Statistics module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to hijack the victim's account. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-080 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3786.title: Organic Groups Vocabulary module for Drupal group titles cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3786.body: The Organic Groups Vocabulary module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the group titles to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-097 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3788.title: OpenDocMan username SQL injection
CVE-2009-3788.body: OpenDocMan is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the frmuser (aka Username) parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenDocMan (1.2.5.2 or later), available from the OpenDocMan Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3789.title: OpenDocMan multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3789.body: OpenDocMan is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenDocMan (1.2.5.2 or later), available from the OpenDocMan Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3790.title: FormMax .aim buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3790.body: FormMax is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing .aim import files. By persuading a victim to import a specially-crafted .aim file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3796.title: Adobe Flash Player and Air data code execution
CVE-2009-3796.body: Adobe Flash Player and Air could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified data injection error. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB09-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-3797.title: Adobe Flash Player and Air memory corruption code execution
CVE-2009-3797.body: Adobe Flash Player and Air could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB09-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-3798.title: Adobe Flash Player and Air unspecified code execution
CVE-2009-3798.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player and Air could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB09-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-3799.title: Adobe Flash Player and Air unspecified integer overflow
CVE-2009-3799.body: Adobe Flash Player and Air could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow when generating ActionScript exception handlers. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site or open a malicious SWF file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Refer to APSB09-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-3802.title: Amiro.CMS index.php path disclosure
CVE-2009-3802.body: Amiro.CMS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script containing an invalid loginname parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of Amiro.CMS (5.6 or later), available from the Amiro.CMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3803.title: Amiro.CMS loginname cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3803.body: Amiro.CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the loginname parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Amiro.CMS (5.6 or later), available from the Amiro.CMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3807.title: MixVibes Pro .vib buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3807.body: MixVibes is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .vib file containing an overly long string, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3809.title: Acoustica MP3 Audio Mixer .sgp and .m3u buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3809.body: Acoustica MP3 Audio Mixer is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing .sgp and .m3u files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .sgp and .m3u file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3810.title: Acoustica MP3 Audio Mixer .sgp and .m3u buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3810.body: Acoustica MP3 Audio Mixer is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing .sgp and .m3u files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .sgp and .m3u file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3811.title: Music Tag Editor MP3 buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3811.body: Music Tag Editor is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing MP3 files. By persuading a victim to open an MP3 file containing an overly long ID3 tag, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3812.title: Multiple OtsAv products .olf file buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3812.body: Multiple OtsAv products, including DJ, TV, and Radio, are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing .olf playlist files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .olf playlist file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3823.title: Mobilelib gold myhtml.php file include
CVE-2009-3823.body: Mobilelib gold could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the myhtml.php script using the GLOBALS[page] parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3824.title: Greenwood Content Manager processor.php file include
CVE-2009-3824.body: Greenwood Content Manager could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the processor.php script using the content_path parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3825.title: GenCMS show.php and SiteNew.php file include
CVE-2009-3825.body: GenCMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the show.php and SiteNew.php scripts using the "p" or step parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3826.title: squidGuard URL security bypass
CVE-2009-3826.body: squidGuard could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by multiple buffer overflow errors when processing URLs. By sending an overly long URL, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the URL filter.For squidGuard 1.3: Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Patch 20091019), available from the squidGuard Web site. See References. For squidGuard 1.4: Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Patch 20091015), available from the squidGuard Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3828.title: EverFocus authentication security bypass
CVE-2009-3828.body: EverFocus EDR1600 could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the Web authentication mechanism. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to log into the Web interface without valid authentication credentials to view live video feeds.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3830.title: Microsoft SharePoint download feature information disclosure
CVE-2009-3830.body: Microsoft SharePoint could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the download.aspx script in the download functionality in Team Services. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker with Open Items or Add and Customize Pages permission could exploit this vulnerability using the SourceUrl or Source parameter to view the source code of arbitrary ASP.NET files from the backend database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3831.title: Opera domain names code execution
CVE-2009-3831.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of domain names. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (10.01 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3832.title: Opera Web fonts spoofing
CVE-2009-3832.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the improper handling of Web fonts intended for use as page content. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the domain name displayed in the address field to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (10.01 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3834.title: Photoblog component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3834.body: The Photoblog component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the category parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of the Photoblog component for Joomla! (alpha 3b or later), available from the Joomla! Extensions Directory Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3835.title: JShop component for Joomla! pid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2009-3835.body: The JShop component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the pid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.As a workaround for this vulnerability, uninstall the affected component.

CVE-2009-3837.title: Eureka Email POP3 buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3837.body: Eureka Email is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing POP3 responses. By persuading a victim to connect to a malicious mail server, a remote attacker could send an overly long error message to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3838.title: Pegasus Mail POP3 buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3838.body: Pegasus Mail is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing POP3 responses. By persuading a victim to connect to a malicious mail server, a remote attacker could send an overly long string to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Pegasus Mail (4.51 or later), available from the Pegasus Mail Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3843.title: HP Operations Manager HTMLManagerServlet class code execution
CVE-2009-3843.body: HP Operations Manager could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a hidden account in the users Tomcat XML file. By sending a specially-crafted POST request to /manager/html/upload, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a file and gain unauthorized access to the org.apache.catalina.manager.HTMLManagerServlet class to execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM level privileges.Refer to HPSBMA02478 SSRT090251 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3844.title: HP Openview Data Protector Application Recovery Manager OmniInet buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3844.body: HP Openview Data Protector Application Recovery Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the OmniInet process. By sending specially-crafted MSG_PROTOCOL (0x010b) packets, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02481 SSRT090113 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3846.title: HP Openview Network Node Manager ovlogin.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3846.body: HP Openview Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by ovlogin.exe. By sending a specially-crafted request via the userid and passwd variables, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02483 SSRT090257 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3848.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager strcat() buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3848.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the nnmRptConfig.exe CGI executable related to a vsprintf() call when running on Internet Information Services. By sending a specially-crafted request HTTP POST request to TCP port 80 using the Template parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM level privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02483 SSRT090257 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3849.title: HP Openview NNM snmp.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3849.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the snmp.exe CGI executable related to a sprintf() call when running on Internet Information Services. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request to TCP port 80 via the Oid parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02483 SSRT090257 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3849.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager nnmRptConfig.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3849.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the nnmRptConfig.exe CGI executable related to a strcat() call when running on Internet Information Services. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request to TCP port 80 using the Template parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02483 SSRT090257 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3858.title: GejoSoft photos/tags cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3858.body: GejoSoft is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input to photos/tags. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3859.title: Retina WiFi Scanner .rws file buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3859.body: Retina WiFi Scanner is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing .rws files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .rws file containing an overly long RWS010 attribute, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to eEye Digital Security AD20090710 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3895.title: libexif exif_entry_fix() buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3895.body: libexif is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the exif_entry_fix() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the affected application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of libexif (0.6.19 or later), available from Sourceforge.net- File Release Notes. See References.

CVE-2009-3897.title: Dovecot base_dir privilege escalation
CVE-2009-3897.body: Dovecot could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by insecure permissions being set on the base_dir directory. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to log in to an account with the privileges of another Dovecot user.Upgrade to the latest version of Dovecot (1.2.8 or later), available from the Dovecot Download Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3903.title: ManageEngine Netflow Analyzer index.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3903.body: ManageEngine Netflow Analyzer is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the view or section parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Netflow Analyzer (7.5 build 7501or later), available from the ManageEngine Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3904.title: CubeCart session management security bypass
CVE-2009-3904.body: CubeCart could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an empty sessId (ccAdmin cookie), user-agent and X_CLUSTER_CLIENT_IP header to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the application.Upgrade to the latest version of CubeCart (4.3.5 or later), available from the CubeCart Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3911.title: TFTGallery sample parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3911.body: TFTGallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the settings.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the sample parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3913.title: Xerox Fiery Webtools summary.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3913.body: Xerox Fiery Webtools is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the summary.php script using the select parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3914.title: Temporary Invitation module for Drupal Name field cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3914.body: The Temporary Invitation module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when creating a new invitation. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Name field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-093 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3915.title: Link module for Drupal title cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3915.body: The Link module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. If the "Separate title and URL" format is used, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the title field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-096 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3916.title: Node Hierarchy module for Drupal titles cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3916.body: The Node Hierarchy module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when displaying the list of children for a node. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using child node titles to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-091 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3917.title: S5 Presentation Player module for Drupal HTML head cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3917.body: The S5 Presentation Player module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the HTML head element to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-092 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3918.title: Zoomify module for Drupal node title cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3918.body: The Zoomify module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the node title to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-098 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3919.title: NGP COO/CWP Integration module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3919.body: The NGP COO/CWP Integration module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-094 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3920.title: NGP COO/CWP Integration module for Drupal logs security bypass
CVE-2009-3920.body: The NGP COO/CWP Integration module for Drupal could allow an attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions set on the administration page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass intended security restrictions and view log information.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-094 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3922.title: User Protect module for Drupal unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-3922.body: The User Protect module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to delete protection for users. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-090 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3923.title: Sun Virtual Infrastructure unauthorized access
CVE-2009-3923.body: Sun Virtual Infrastructure (VDI) could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system, caused by an error in the authentication mechanism. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to the VirtualBox Web service.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 268328 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3924.title: PunkBuster pbsv.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3924.body: PunkBuster is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by pbsv.dll. If Soldier of Fortune II with PunkBuster is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted restart packet containing an overly long string to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3931.title: Google Chrome warning weak security
CVE-2009-3931.body: Google Chrome could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the failure to issue a warning for certain file types prior to download. By persuading a victim to download a malicious file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (3.0.195.32 or later), available from the Google Chome Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3933.title: Google Chrome WebKit denial of service
CVE-2009-3933.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the WebKit component. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site that invokes the JavaScript setInterval method, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available CPU resources.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (3.0.195.32 or later), available from the Google Chome Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3936.title: Multiple Citrix products SSL spoofing
CVE-2009-3936.body: Multiple Citrix products could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by an error when processing SSL/TLS certificates. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted certificate, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to cause the victim to accept spoofed certificates.Refer to CTX123248 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3938.title: Poppler ABWOutputDev::endWord() buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3938.body: Poppler is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ABWOutputDev::endWord() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the affected application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-3946.title: Joomla! XML information disclosure
CVE-2009-3946.body: Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper handling of XML files. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read the restricted content of an extension's XML file and obtain the version number of the extension and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Joomla! (1.5.15 or later), available from the Joomla! Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3948.title: COWON Media Center .wav file denial of service
CVE-2009-3948.body: COWON Media Center is vulnerable to a denial of service, cause by an error when parsing certain .wav files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .wav file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3949.title: Infinity profile.php security bypass
CVE-2009-3949.body: Infinity could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the profile.php script. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions to create another admin account.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3951.title: Adobe Flash Player ActiveX control information disclosure
CVE-2009-3951.body: An unspecified error in the Adobe Flash Player ActiveX control could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to disclose local file names and obtain sensitive information.Refer to APSB09-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-3953.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader U3D code execution
CVE-2009-3953.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an array indexing error in U3D support. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file containing a malicious U3D model, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB10-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3955.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader JpxDecode code execution
CVE-2009-3955.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a sign extension error when handling a Jp2c stream of a JpxDecode data stream embedded within a PDF document. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB10-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3958.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader Download Manager buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3958.body: NOS Microsystems Adobe getPlus Helper ActiveX control (gp.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page that passes an overly long argument to multiple initialization parameters, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the browser to crash.Refer to APSB10-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3959.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader U3D support code execution
CVE-2009-3959.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in U3D support. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB10-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3967.title: SuperCharged Linking browse.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3967.body: SuperCharged Linking is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the browse.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3970.title: PHP Dir Submit index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3970.body: PHP Dir Submit is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the aid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3975.title: Moa Gallery index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-3975.body: Moa Gallery is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the gallery_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3976.title: Labtam ProFTP welcome message buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3976.body: Labtam ProFTP is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via an overly long welcome message to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the service to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-3980.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey browser engine code execution
CVE-2009-3980.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error within the browser engine. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or cause a denial of service.Refer to MFSA 2009-65 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3987.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey GeckoActiveXObject information disclosure
CVE-2009-3987.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. Different exception error messages are returned by GeckoActiveXObject based on the existance of the ProjID in the system registry for the requested COM object. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to enumerate a victim's existing COM objects and possibly allow the attacker to create a profile to track the victim's browser sessions.Refer to MFSA 2009-71 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3988.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey showModalDialog() cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-3988.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions and conduct cross-site scripting attacks, caused by an error in the showModalDialog() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions and execute JavaScript in the context of another domain invoking the affected function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Refer to MFSA 2010-04 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-3989.title: Bugzilla files information disclosure
CVE-2009-3989.body: Bugzilla could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to restrict access to some files and directories stored on the Web server. If custom installations were added to the files, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view the files from a Web browser and obtain passwords and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Bugzilla (3.0.11, 3.2.6, 3.4.5, or 3.5.3 or later), available from the Bugzilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-3994.title: DevIL GetUID() buffer overflow
CVE-2009-3994.body: DevIL is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the GetUID() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted DICOM file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-4002.title: Adobe Shockwave Player 3D models buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4002.body: Adobe Shockwave Player is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing Shockwave 3D models. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Shockwave file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB10-03 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4003.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Shockwave files buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4003.body: Adobe Shockwave Player is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by multiple integer overflows when processing different block types. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Shockwave file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB10-03 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4004.title: Linux Kernel kvm_vcpu_ioctl_x86_setup_mce() privilege escalation
CVE-2009-4004.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in the kvm_vcpu_ioctl_x86_setup_mce() function. By sending a specially-crafted KVM_X86_SETUP_MCE IOCTL request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux Kernel (2.6.32-rc7 or later), available from the The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4005.title: Linux Kernel hfc_usb.c privilege escalation
CVE-2009-4005.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a read buffer overflow in the collect_rx_frame function within the hfc_usb.c. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a speciallty-crafted HDLC packet that arrives over ISDN to execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2009-4006.title: RhinoSoft Serv-U FTP Server TEA decoding buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4006.body: RhinoSoft Serv-U FTP Server is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the TEA decoding algorithm. By sending an overly long hexadecimal string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Serv-U FTP Server (9.1.0.0 or later), available from the Rhino Software Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4009.title: PowerDNS Recursor unspecified buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4009.body: PowerDNS Recursor is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling packets. By using unknown attack vectors, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Refer to PowerDNS Security Advisory 2010-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4021.title: Linux Kernel fuse_direct_io() denial of service
CVE-2009-4021.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an invalid pointer dereference in the fuse_direct_io() function. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a kernel oops.Refer to Red Hat Bugzilla Bug 538734 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-4024.title: PEAR Net_Ping ping() command execution
CVE-2009-4024.body: PEAR Net_Ping could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation of the host parameter by the ping() function prior to being used in an exec() call. By sending a request using the host parameter containing shell metacharacters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the system.Refer to PSA 20091114-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4025.title: PEAR Net_Traceroute traceroute() command execution
CVE-2009-4025.body: PEAR Net_Traceroute could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation of the host parameter by the traceroute() function prior to being used in an exec() call. By sending a request using the host parameter containing shell metacharacters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the system.Refer to PSA 20091114-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4033.title: acpid log file privilege escalation
CVE-2009-4033.body: acpid could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by invoking of a call to the open function with insufficient arguments by a specific Red Hat patch. By executing the /var/log/acpid log file, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges on the system, obtain sensitive information or cause a denial of service.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-4035.title: xpdf and KPDF FoFiType1::parse() buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4035.body: xpdf and applications implementing xpdf, including KPDF are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer underflow by the FoFiType1::parse() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF document, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.For xpdf: Upgrade to the latest version of xpdf (3.01 or later), available from the Xpdf Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-4043.title: AddToAny module for Drupal node titles cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4043.body: The AddToAny module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using node titles to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2009-100 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4052.title: Multiple IBM Rational products JSF Widget Library Runtime cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4052.body: Multiple IBM Rational products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the JSF Widget Library Runtime. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For IBM Rational Application Developer for WebSphere Software: Upgrade to the latest version of (7.0.0.10 or later), available from the IBM Support and Downloads Web Site. See References. For IBM Rational Software Architect: Upgrade to the latest version of (7.0.0.10 or later), available from the IBM Support and Downloads Web Site. See References.

CVE-2009-4057.title: iF Portfolio Nexus component for Joomla! id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2009-4057.body: The iF Portfolio Nexus component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of iF Portfolio Nexus, available from the inertialFATE Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4058.title: Telebid Auction Script allauctions.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-4058.body: Telebid Auction Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the allauctions.php script using the aid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4059.title: JoomClip component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-4059.body: The JoomClip component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of May 29, 2010.

CVE-2009-4060.title: CubeCart viewProd.inc.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-4060.body: CubeCart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the viewProd.inc.php script using the productID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of CubeCart (4.3.7 or later), available from the CubeCart Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4061.title: Agreement module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4061.body: The Agreement module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-106 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4062.title: Printfriendly module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4062.body: The Printfriendly module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-109 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4063.title: Subgroups for Organic Groups module for Drupal node title cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4063.body: The Subgroups for Organic Groups module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the node title to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-105 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4064.title: Gallery Assist module for Drupal node title cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4064.body: The Gallery Assist module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the node title to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-108 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4066.title: PHPList Integration module for Drupal unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-4066.body: The PHPList Integration module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to subscribe and unsubscribe to mailing lists. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-102 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4078.title: Redmine unspecified input cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4078.body: Redmine is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Redmine (0.8.6 or 0.8.7 or later), available from the Redmine Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4079.body: Redmine is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to delete tickets. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of Redmine (0.8.6 or 0.8.7 or later), available from the Redmine Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4082.title: Outreach Project Tool index.php file include
CVE-2009-4082.body: Outreach Project Tool could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the CRM_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4083.title: e107 multiple unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4083.body: e107 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple unspecified scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4084.title: e107 Search function SQL injection
CVE-2009-4084.body: e107 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the Search function, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4085.title: PHP Traverser mp3_id.php file include
CVE-2009-4085.body: PHP Traverser could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the mp3_id.php script using the GLOBALS[BASE] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4086.title: Xerver HTTP response splitting
CVE-2009-4086.body: Xerver is vulnerable to HTTP response splitting attacks, caused by improper validation of input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to cause the server to return a split response. This would allow the attacker to perform further attacks, such as Web cache poisoning, cross-site scripting, and possibly obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4087.title: telepark.wiki index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4087.body: telepark.wiki is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the PATH_INFO in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of telepark.wiki (2.4.23 or later), available from the telepark Web Software Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4088.title: telepark.wiki multiple scripts file include
CVE-2009-4088.body: telepark.wiki could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the getjs.php, getcsslocal.php or upload.php script using the css or group parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of telepark.wiki (2.4.23 or later), available from the telepark Web Software Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4089.title: telepark.wiki deletePage.php and deleteComment.php security bypass
CVE-2009-4089.body: telepark.wiki could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by missing authentication checks in the deletePage.php and deleteComment.php scripts. By sending a direct request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to delete pages or user comments.Upgrade to the latest version of telepark.wiki (2.4.23 or later), available from the telepark Web Software Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4090.title: telepark.wiki addComment.php file upload
CVE-2009-4090.body: telepark.wiki could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the addComment.php script. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a file with a name containing a NULL byte, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of telepark.wiki (2.4.23 or later), available from the telepark Web Software Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4091.title: Simplog comments.php security bypass
CVE-2009-4091.body: Simplog could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the comments.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the op or cid parameter to edit and delete arbitrary comments from the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4094.title: eZine component for Joomla! d4m_ajax_pagenav.php file include
CVE-2009-4094.body: The eZine component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the d4m_ajax_pagenav.php script using the GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4095.title: myPhile password security bypass
CVE-2009-4095.body: myPhile could allow a remote attacker to bypass restrictions, caused by an error when handling login attempts with empty passwords by the authentication mechanism. By providing a valid username, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an empty password to gain unauthorized access to the application.Upgrade to the latest version of myPhile (1.2.2 or later), available from the companionway.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4097.title: Serenity Audio Player .m3u buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4097.body: Serenity Audio Player is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the MplayInputFile() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .m3u playlist file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4098.title: OpenX banner-edit.php file upload
CVE-2009-4098.body: OpenX could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the banner-edit.php script. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenX (2.8.2 or later), available from the OpenX Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4099.title: GCalendar component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-4099.body: The GCalendar component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the gcid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. Note: This vulnerability also affects the Google Calendar component for Joomla!Upgrade to the latest version of GCalendar (2.1.15 or later), available from the GCalendar Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4101.title: infoRSS extension for Firefox RSS feeds cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4101.body: The infoRSS extension for Firefox is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an RSS feed to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser in the "chrome:" context, if the attacker could persuade the victim to load a specially-crafted RSS feed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of infoRSS extension for Firefox (1.2.0 or later), available from the Mozilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4102.title: Sage extension for Firefox description cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4102.body: The Sage extension for Firefox is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the description tag within RSS feeds to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser in the "chrome:" context, if the attacker could persuade the victim to load a specially-crafted RSS feed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-4105.title: TypSoft FTP Server APPE and DELE commands denial of service
CVE-2009-4105.body: TYPSoft FTP Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when the APPE or DELE command share a socket connection. By sending a specially-crafted request to the APPE or DELE command, a remote authenticated attacker could cause the server to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4106.title: Agoko CMS editpage-2.php file upload
CVE-2009-4106.body: Agoko CMS could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the editpage-2.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the filename or text parameter to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP commands on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4108.title: XM Easy Personal FTP Server files denial of service
CVE-2009-4108.body: XM Easy Personal FTP Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the failure to handle more than 2000 files or folders. By uploading the overly large amount of files or folders to the root directory and connecting to the FTP server using the FTP client, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4110.title: DotNetNuke search cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4110.body: DotNetNuke is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the search parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of DotNetNuke (5.2.0 or later), available from the DotNetNuke Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4112.title: Cacti Data Input Method command execution
CVE-2009-4112.body: Cacti could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By changing the Data Input Method for the Linux - Get Memory Usage setting, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary shell commands on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-4113.title: CuteNews category.db.php module code execution
CVE-2009-4113.body: CuteNews could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the category.db.php script. A remote attacker with administrator privileges could exploit this vulnerability using the Icon URL or Category Access field to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of UTF-8 CuteNews (8b or later), available from the UTF-8 CuteNews Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4114.title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus Kl1.sys privilege escalation
CVE-2009-4114.body: Kaspersky Anti-Virus could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in kl1.sys.v. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a specially-crafted IOCTL 0x0022c008 call, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges or cause the kernel to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Kaspersky Anti-Virus (9.0.0.736 or later), available from the Kaspersky Lab Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4115.title: CuteNews category.db.php module code execution
CVE-2009-4115.body: CuteNews could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the category.db.php script. A remote attacker with administrator privileges could exploit this vulnerability using the Icon URL or Category Access field to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of UTF-8 CuteNews (8b or later), available from the UTF-8 CuteNews Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4116.title: CutePHP CuteNews multiple directory traversal
CVE-2009-4116.body: CutePHP CuteNews could allow a remote authenticated attacker to traverse directories on the system. caused by improper validation of user-supplied request. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to the list or editnews action to the Editnews module, and the save_con[skin] parameter in the Options module to read and execute arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of UTF-8 CuteNews (8b or later), available from the UTF-8 CuteNews Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4116.title: CuteNews options module file include
CVE-2009-4116.body: CuteNews could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script in the options module using the skin parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of UTF-8 CuteNews (8b or later), available from the UTF-8 CuteNews Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4117.title: MuPDF multiple pdf_shade4.c buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4117.body: MuPDF is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by the pdf_loadtype4shade(), pdf_loadtype5shade(), pdf_loadtype6shade(), and pdf_loadtype7shade() functions in mupdf/pdf_shade4.c. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .pdf file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code with privileges of the affected application. Note: This vulnerability also affects Sumatra PDF.For MuPDF: Upgrade to the latest version of MuPDF, available from the MuPDF Web site. See References. For Sumatra PDF: Upgrade to the latest version of Sumatra PDF (1.0.1 or later), available from the Sumatra PDF Web site. See References.
