CVE-2009-4119.title: Feed Element Mapper module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4119.body: The Feed Element Mapper module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2009-104 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4120.title: Quick.Cart and Quick.CMS delete function cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-4120.body: Quick.Cart and Quick.CMS are vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to delete arbitrary data with the privileges of the user. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4121.title: Quick.Cart and Quick.CMS delete function cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-4121.body: Quick.Cart and Quick.CMS are vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to delete arbitrary data with the privileges of the user. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4124.title: Ruby rb_str_justify() buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4124.body: Ruby is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the rb_str_justify() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via String#ljust, String#center, and String#rjust, to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Ruby (1.9.1-p376 or later), available from the Ruby Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4128.title: GNU GRUB 2 password authentication bypass
CVE-2009-4128.body: GNU GRUB 2 could allow a local attacker to bypass authentication restrictions, caused by improper validation by the password functionality. A local attacker with physical access to the host could exploit this vulnerability using a known username and partial password to gain unauthorized access to the system.Upgrade to the latest version of GRUB 2 (1.97.1 or later), available from the GNU GRUB 2 Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4139.title: Red Hat Network Satellite server spacewalk-java cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-4139.body: Red Hat Network Satellite server is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by spacewalk-java packages. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to RHSA-2011-0879 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4145.title: NetworkManager nm-connection-editor information disclosure
CVE-2009-4145.body: NetworkManager could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by nm-connection-editor publishing restricted information via D-Bus. By monitoring the D-Bus signals, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the GNOME GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2009-4151.title: Best Practical Solutions RT (Request Tracker) unspecified session hijacking
CVE-2009-4151.body: Best Practical Solutions RT (Request Tracker) could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted link and log into the application, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack another user's account and gain the victim's privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of RT (3.6.10 or later), available from the Best Practical Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4168.title: Joomulus module for Joomla! tagcloud cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4168.body: The Joomulus module for Joomla! is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by tagcloud_ell.swf, tagcloud_eng.swf, tagcloud_por.swf, tagcloud_rus.swf, and tagcloud_jpn.swf. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the tagcloud parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4168.title: WP-Cumulus plugin for WordPress tagcloud cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4168.body: The WP-Cumulus plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by tagcloud.swf. file. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the tagcloud parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of WP-Cumulus plugin (1.23 or later), available from the WordPress Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4171.title: Yahoo! Messenger ActiveX control denial of service
CVE-2009-4171.body: The Yahoo! Messenger ActiveX control (YahooBridgeLib.dll) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the RegisterMe() method to cause the affected application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4172.title: CuteNews news articles cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4172.body: CuteNews is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the body of a news article to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of CuteNews (UTF-8b or later), available from the UTF-8 CuteNews Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4173.title: CuteNews index.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-4173.body: CuteNews is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user supplied input by the index.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to create a new admin user. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of UTF-8 CuteNews (8b or later), available from the UTF-8 CuteNews Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4174.title: CuteNews articles security bypass
CVE-2009-4174.body: CuteNews could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper access controls on submitted articles. By sending a direct request to the id parameter, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access restricted content and possibly launch further attacks against the system.Upgrade to the latest version of UTF-8 CuteNews (8b or later), available from the UTF-8 CuteNews Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4175.title: CuteNews search.php path disclosure
CVE-2009-4175.body: CuteNews could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the search.php script using an invalid date parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of UTF-8 CuteNews (8b or later), available from the UTF-8 CuteNews Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4176.title: HP Openview Network Node Manager ovsessionmgr.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4176.body: HP Openview Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by ovsessionmgr.exe. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted userid or passwd POST variable to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02483 SSRT090257 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4177.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager webappmon.exe CGI buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4177.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the webappmon.exe CGI application related to a strcat() call. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an HTTP Host header to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02483 SSRT090257 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4178.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager OvWebHelp.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4178.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the OvWebHelp.exe CGI application. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted Topic POST parameter to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02483 SSRT090257 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4179.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager ovalarm.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4179.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by ovalarm.exe CGI application. By sending a specially-crafted request containing an overly long Accept-Language HTTP header, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02483 SSRT090257 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4180.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager snmpviewer.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4180.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the snmpviewer.exe CGI application, related to a call to strcat(). By sending a specially-crafted HTTP Host header, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02483 SSRT090257 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4181.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager ovwebsnmpsrv.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4181.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by ovwebsnmpsrv.exe application. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request containing an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02483 SSRT090257 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4186.title: Apple Safari CSS background property buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4186.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow caused by improper bounds checking when processing CSS background images. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page containing an overly long CSS background url property value, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4194.title: Golden FTP Server public directory traversal
CVE-2009-4194.body: Golden FTP Server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted FTP delete request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to traverse directories and delete arbitrary files from the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4196.title: Huawei MT882 multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4196.body: Huawei MT882 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4203.title: Arab Portal admin_func.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-4203.body: Arab Portal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin_func.php script using the X-Forwarded-for header or Client-IP HTTP header, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4204.title: Flashlight read.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-4204.body: Flashlight is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the read.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4205.title: Flashlight admin.php file include
CVE-2009-4205.body: Flashlight could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.php script using the action parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4206.title: Million Dollar Text Links id SQL injection
CVE-2009-4206.body: Million Dollar Text Links is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin.link.modify.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4208.title: Open-school index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-4208.body: Open-school is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4210.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer and Windows Media player Intel Indeo codec code execution
CVE-2009-4210.body: Multiple unspecified errors in the Intel Indeo41 codec, as used by Microsoft Internet Explorer and Windows Media player, could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to Microsoft Security Advisory (954157) for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4210.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer and Windows Media player Intel Indeo codec code execution
CVE-2009-4210.body: An unspecified memory corruption error in the Intel Indeo codec as used by Microsoft Internet Explorer and Windows Media player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to Microsoft Security Advisory (954157) for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2009-4215.title: Multiple Panda Software products directory privilege escalation
CVE-2009-4215.body: Multiple Panda Software products could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by insecure permissions being set on the installation directory. By replacing application binaries, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM level privileges.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (hfgp30910s1_r7.exe, hfp150906s19_r1.exe or hft90906s15_r1.exe), available from the Panda Security Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4216.title: klinza cms menulast.php file include
CVE-2009-4216.body: klinza cms could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the menulast.php script using the LANG parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4220.title: PointComma pctemplate.php file include
CVE-2009-4220.body: PointComma could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the pctemplate.php script using the pcConfig[smartyPath] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4223.title: KR - PHP Web Content Server krgourl.php file include
CVE-2009-4223.body: KR - PHP Web Content Server could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the krgourl.php script using the DOCUMENT_ROOT parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4224.title: SweetRice post.php file include
CVE-2009-4224.body: SweetRice could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the post.php and news_modify.php scripts using the root_dir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4225.title: CA eTrust PestPatrol ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2009-4225.body: The CA eTrust PestPatrol ActiveX control (ppctl.dl) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string argument to the Initialize() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4229.title: Active Bids default.asp SQL injection
CVE-2009-4229.body: Active Bids is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the default.asp script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4235.title: acpid umask weak security
CVE-2009-4235.body: acpid could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an unrestricted umask being set on the /var/log/acpid file. By reading or overwriting the file, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information or cause a denial of service.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-4236.title: EC-CUBE LC_Page_Admin_Customer_SearchCustomer.php security bypass
CVE-2009-4236.body: EC-CUBE could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the LC_Page_Admin_Customer_SearchCustomer.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive customer information.Upgrade to the latest version of EC-CUBE (2.4.2 or later), available from the EC-CUBE Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-4239.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4239.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Information Server Web console. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of InfoSphere Information Server (8.1 Fix Pack 1 or later), available from the IBM Support and Downloads Web Site. See References.

CVE-2009-4240.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by some SETUID binaries in DataStage. See References.

See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2009-4539.title: SQLiteManager redirect cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4539.body: SQLiteManager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the main.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the redirect parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4540.title: Mini-CMS page.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-4540.body: Mini-CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the page.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4541.title: IsolSoft Support Center index.php, newticket.php and rempass.php file include
CVE-2009-4541.body: IsolSoft Support Center could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php, newticket.php and rempass.php scripts using the lang parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of June 19, 2010.

CVE-2009-4542.title: IsolSoft Support Center newticket.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4542.body: IsolSoft Support Center is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the newticket.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the lang parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of June 19, 2010.

CVE-2009-4543.title: Facil Helpdesk lng file include
CVE-2009-4543.body: Facil Helpdesk could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the lng parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4543.title: Facil Helpdesk index.php file include
CVE-2009-4543.body: Facil Helpdesk could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the lng parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4544.title: Facil Helpdesk kbase.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4544.body: Facil Helpdesk is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the kbase.php script. CVE-2009-4545.title: Logoshows BBS globepersonnel.mdb information disclosure
CVE-2009-4545.body: Logoshows BBS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the globepersonnel.mdb file stored inside the Web root. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could download the database and obtain user data and other sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4547.title: ViArt CMS forum.php and forum_topic_new.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4547.body: ViArt CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the forum.php, forums.php and forum_topic_new.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the category_id or forum_id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4548.title: ViArt Helpdesk category_id cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4548.body: ViArt Helpdesk is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the category_id, forum_id or search_category_id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4553.title: iRehearse .m3u denial of service
CVE-2009-4553.body: iRehearse is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a stack-based buffer overflow when processing .m3u files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .m3u playlist file containing an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4554.title: Snitz Forums 2000 multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4554.body: Snitz Forums 2000 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the url parameter to pop_send_to_friend.asp, and an onload attribute in a sound tag. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4555.title: AgoraCart unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2009-4555.body: AgoraCart is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to modify an .htaccess file or change the user's password. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4556.body: Quick Heal Antivirus Plus and Quick Heal Total Security could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by installation of the Quick Update Service (quhlpsvc.exe) under the security context of the Everyone group with Full Control permissions granted. By modifying the quhlpsvc.exe file and rebooting the system, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2009-043 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4692.title: RadLance index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4692.body: RadLance is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the fid or "pr" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4693.title: miniCWB LANG file include
CVE-2009-4693.body: miniCWB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the LANG parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4876.title: Netrix CMS cikkform.php security bypass
CVE-2009-4876.body: Netrix CMS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the cikkform.php script. By sending a direct request using the cid parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify arbitrary page content.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4881.title: GNU C Library __vstrfmon_l integer overflow
CVE-2009-4881.body: GNU C Library could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in the __vstrfmon_l function. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted format string to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of GNU C Library (2.10.1 or later), available from the GNU C Library Web page. See References.

CVE-2009-4883.title: PHPRecipeBook index.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-4883.body: PHPRecipeBook is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the base_id or course_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4884.title: phpCommunity class_forum.php and class_search.php SQL injection
CVE-2009-4884.body: phpCommunity is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the class_forum.php or class_search.php script using the forum_id, wert, or topic_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4885.title: phpCommunity login.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2009-4885.body: phpCommunity is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the msg parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4886.title: phpCommunity show_file.php and show_source.php directory traversal
CVE-2009-4886.body: phpCommunity could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the show_file.php or show_source.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the file or path parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2009-4887.title: CMS S.Builder index.php file include
CVE-2009-4887.body: CMS S.Builder could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2009-4888.body: PHortail is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the poster.php script. CVE-2009-4962.body: Fat Player is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing .wav playlist files. CVE-2009-4975.body: QtDemoBrowser is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by webview.cpp. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL associated with a nonexistent domain name to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. CVE-2009-4976.body: kwebkitpart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by webkitpart.cpp. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL associated with a nonexistent domain name to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. CVE-2009-5019.body: Web Wiz NewsPad could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the NewsPad.mdb file stored inside the Web root. CVE-2009-5030.body: OpenJPEG could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the tcd_free_encode() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Gray16 TIFF image file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt heap memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Revision r1703), available from the OpenJPEG Repository. CVE-2009-5032.body: IBM Lotus Notes Traveler could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the sending of unencrypted messages by the encrypted e-mail feature. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using network sniffing tools to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Lotus Notes Traveler (8.5.0.2 or later), available from the IBM Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-5033.title: IBM Lotus Notes Traveler argument unauthorized access
CVE-2009-5033.body: IBM Lotus Notes Traveler could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system, caused by the improper handling of a "* *" argument sequence for a certain tell command. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit his vulnerability using a sync operation to gain unauthorized access to another user's data.Upgrade to the latest version of Lotus Notes Traveler (8.5.0.2 or later), available from the IBM Web site. See References.

CVE-2009-5034.title: IBM Lotus Notes Traveler new process denial of service
CVE-2009-5034.body: IBM Lotus Notes Traveler is vulnerable to a denial of service. By syncing an overly large volume of data related to the launch of a new process, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available memory resources and cause the daemon to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Lotus Notes Traveler (8.5.0.2 or later), available from the IBM Web site. CVE-2009-5037.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances ASDM denial of service

A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an overly long URL to cause an ASDM syslog outage.Upgrade to the latest version of Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances (8.2(3) or later), available from the Cisco Web site. CVE-2009-5038.title: Cisco IOS IRC traffic denial of service
CVE-2009-5038.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of IRC traffic during a specific time period after an initial reload. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an attempted connection to a certain IRC server to cause the device to reload.Upgrade to the latest version of Cisco IOS (15.0(1)XA1 or later), available from the Cisco Web site. CVE-2009-5096.body: The Flag Content module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input.
